loans.name: Magaly Salvadora

texts.es: Magaly Salvadora V. es una persona muy buena y umilde, es una persona que se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles o de consumo diario, ella vende huevos, frijol,arroz,maiz etc, y tambien se dedica a la venta de productos enlatados, ella dice que gracias a Dios le a ido bien en su negocio,con su credito anterior logro creser un poco mas con su ganancia, y gracia a eso a ido aumentando sus ventas, solicita este credito para compra de producto comestibles, para asi aumentar un poco mas su ganancia y asi ofrecer mas bariedad de productos a sus clientes su sueño es tener un local mas grande y asi aumentar mas sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia agradese a fape y a kiva por la ayuda brindada
texts.en:
Magaly Salvadora V. is an outstanding and modest individual who sells food products for daily consumption such as eggs, beans, rice, corn, and other products. She also sells canned goods. Thanks to God, Magaly says her business has done very well. With her previous loan, she was able to earn a little bit more income due to an increase in her sales.

She is requesting this loan to buy food products so that she can generate slightly more revenue and offer a greater variety of merchandise to her customers. Her dream is to have a larger location so that she can increase her income and move her family forward with the support that FAPE and Kiva has provided.

loans.use: Purchase groceries to sell

loans.name: Rosmery

texts.es: La Sra. Rosmery vive en la zona sur. Ella tiene su pensión en la misma zona en la parada del  micro que trabaja por ese sector donde ya tiene mucha clientela, pero en la mayoría son choferes que trabajan en la línea de micros. Tiene una hija de la cual se encarga ella sola y su hija le colabora con la venta de comida, es clienta antigua de bancos de emprendimientos. Ya esta en su tercer ciclo en la agencia plan 3000. El crédito que esta solicitando es para aumentar su capital de trabajo y comprar mesas y sillas. La Sra. Rosmery  ha tenido muchos problemas pero los ha podido superar con mucho esfuerzo y trabajando para darle todo lo necesario para su hija ya que ella es su razón de vivir, la Sra. Es una persona muy trabajadora y demostró responsabilidad en el pago de cuotas, esta agradecida con la institución y con kiva por la confianza brindada
texts.en:
Sra. Rosmery lives in the southern district. She has a diner in the same vicinity as the local bus stop, so she already has many customers who are mostly bus drivers. Rosmery has a daughter who she raises by herself and helps her with selling food.

Rosmery is a longtime Communal Bank client. She is in her third loan cycle as part of the Plan 3000 program. The loan she is requesting will be used to increase her operating capital so that she can purchase tables and chairs. Sra. Rosmery has encountered many problems, but she has been able to overcome them with great effort and hard work in order to provide everything her daughter needs since she is her reason for living. This woman is a very hard worker and has demonstrated that she is responsible in submitting her payments. She thanks Emprender and Kiva for the trust they have demonstrated.

loans.use: Purchase tables & chairs

loans.name: Maritza Del Rocio

texts.es:
Maritza de 45 años, es una mujer trabajadora que aproximadamente hace 8 años atrás comenzó vendiendo víveres para poder tener una tienda surtida. 

Poco a poco ha trabajado desde muy temprano para surtir su tienda, su trabajo lo realiza en horarios rotativos con ayuda de su hermana. Vende variedad de víveres a un costo cómodo para sus clientes. Tiene muchas aspiraciones para el negocio por eso quiere continuar con su tienda pero para eso quiere comprar con el préstamo viveres como bebidas, snack, etc. En el futuro quiere mejorar el nivel de vida y mejorar su negocio con mas mercadería.
texts.en:
Maritza, age 45, is a hardworking woman who began selling groceries approximately eight years ago. She has a store that is well-stocked.

Gradually she began working early to stock her store. She works on a rotating schedule with the help of her sister. Maritza sells a variety of groceries at a cost that is affordable to her customers. She has many aspirations for her business, so she wants to keep it operating and will use this loan to buy groceries such as beverages, snacks, and other products. In the future, she wants to raise her standard of living and improve her business with more merchandise.

loans.use: Purchase beverages & snacks to sell

loans.name: Jaime Humberto

texts.es:
Aunque Jaime Humberto R. Z. trabaja como mayordomo en una finca, este emprendedor no deja de soñar con su propio negocio de cría de vacas para lechería, pues actualmente en el lugar donde trabaja le permiten tener 2, de las cuales saca la leche para venderla a la empresa recolectora y así aumentar sus ingresos. 

Con el fin de continuar con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, conformada por su esposa y su hija de 4 años, Jaime necesita de un préstamo para la compra de 2 vacas, las cuales se convertirán en productoras de leche y serán fuente de sustento para este emprendedor.
texts.en:
Even though he works as a groundskeeper on a farm, Jaime Humberto R. Z. is an entrepreneur who keeps dreaming about his own business raising dairy cows. He currently has his own place that allows him to work twice as hard. His business produces milk that he sells to a collection company so that he can increase his income.

In order to continue his business and improve the quality of life of his family (which consists of his wife and four year old daughter), Jaime needs a loan to buy two cows. These animals will be used to produce milk and become a source of income for this entrepreneur.

loans.use: Purchase two dairy cows

loans.name: Francisca Maria

texts.es:
Francisca de 64 años, es una mujer trabajadora que el destino de la compañía donde trabajaba la despidieron comenzó a vender víveres para tener su tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. 

Cuando ella fue despedida y con el dinero de la liquidación decidió comprar vivieres y ubicar una pequeña tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. Ha venido trabajando durante años en su tienda vendiendo variedades de víveres y en ocasiones cosméticos para tener un dinero adicional.  

Ella quiere seguir con su tienda pero por ahora quiere comprar con el préstamo cosméticos para surtir su tienda y que mujeres compren con más frecuencia.
texts.en:
Francisca, age 64, is a hardworking woman who began selling groceries from a store at the front of her house after she lost her job working at a company.

After she was fired, Francisca used her severance pay to buy groceries and open a small store in the front part of her house. Her business has been operating for many years and offers a variety of groceries and occasionally cosmetics to generate additional income.

Francisca wants to keep her store in operation, so she now wants to use this loan to restock her store with cosmetics that women frequently buy.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics to sell in her store

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen de Cocharcas, tiene 60años, es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo y 2 nietos. Alejandrina se dedica a la confección de blusas, faldas, fustanes y los lleva a las ferias de Acos Vinchos, Rosas Pata, Ccescca, Paccha, aprendió de está actividad desde muy niña y con este oficio ha podido educar a su hijo y ahora ayuda en la educación de sus 2 nietos que están en la universidad.
Alejandrina solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como: Telas, blondas, hilos.
Esta en Finca desde hace 5 años, le gusta por los prestamos que le otorgan y puede ahorrar.
Su sueño es seguir teniendo las misma fuerza para seguir trabajando y que sus nietos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de Cocharcas”. She is 60 years old and a single mother with one child and two grandchildren. Alejandrina earns a living by making blouses, skirts, and petticoats and then brings them to the fairs in Acos Vinchos, Rosas Pata, Ccescca, and Paccha. She learned this skill as a young girl and the income from her job enabled her to provide her child with an education. Now she helps with the education of her two grandchildren who are at the university.

Alejandrina is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of materials such as fabrics, lace, and thread. She has been with FINCA for five years and enjoys the loans that have been given to her and having the ability to save. Her dreams include having the strength to continue working and seeing her grandchildren become professionals.

loans.use: Purchase fabrics, lace, and thread

loans.name: Luz  Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; ella tiene 64 años de edad, viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia tiene su negocio de hospedaje turístico ella brinda este servicio a sus clientes que le hacen reservas mediante su correo a la vez también trabaja con algunas agencias turísticas que le solicitan sus servicios, la socia lleva años en este negocio y se siente feliz ya que mediante este negocio ella puede conocer a más gente y a sus diferentes culturas y esto le hace sentir bien. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de camas, colchones, catres, frasadas entre otros más para así poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "MUJERES UNIDAS" (United Women) communal bank which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Luz Marina is a 64-year-old widow with three children.  She owns a tourist accommodation business and provides service to customers through reservations made by mail.  She also works with tour agents who request her services.  She has had this job for many years and is very happy to be able to meet people from different cultures. 

This member plans to use the loan to buy beds, mattresses, cots and blankets so she can give her customers better service.

She appreciates the loan and is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy beds, mattresses, cots and blankets to provide better service to customers

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera, departamento D. Morazán, donD. vive con su esposo y tres hijos, se dedica a vender tamales, pescado, panes con pollo y sopa D. mondongo, tiene 35 años edad, ella venD. diversos productos saliendo a ofrecerlos casa por casa del lugar cercano a donD. vive, su estrategia es ofrecer cada día un producto distinto para que los clientes siempre le compren.
Ella desea invertir un préstamo en compra D. materiales para preparar los diferentes alimentos que venD., ya que constantemente debe comprar verduras, carnes, condimentos, maíz entre otros, ya que por su diversificación D. venta, también así es la diversificación D. materiales que necesita.
Su sueño es ver a sus hijos estudiar que tengan una opción D. mejorar sus condiciones D. vida en un futuro, para conseguir este sueño ella se esfuerza día con día trabajando y viendo la manera D. no perder los ánimos hasta lograr dicho sueño.
texts.en:
Rosa resides in San Francisco Gotero, Department of Morazán, with her husband and three children. She sells tamales, fish, bread with chicken, and tripe soup. Rosa is 35 years old and sells her various products at a place near her home. Her strategy is to offer a different product each day so that her customers will always buy them.

Rosa wants to invest this loan in the purchase of supplies needed to prepare the different dishes she sells. She constantly buys vegetables, meat, condiments, corn, and other ingredients. The supplies she needs are also diversified. Her dream is to see her children study so that they will have the option to improve their future living conditions. To continue with her dream, Rosa strives to work each day and not lose her motivation to make it come true.

loans.use: Purchase vegetables, meat, condiments, corn, and other ingredients

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen de Cocharcar, tiene 39 años, es casada con 5 hijos. Se dedica a la venta de juguetes. Nancy aprendió de la venta de juguetes de su mamá pues ella se dedicaba a este negocio, viaja a Lima de ahí trae los juguetes y los reparte tienda por tienda. Nancy solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en surtir su mercadería. A Nancy le gusta Finca porque le enseñan los valores, a quererse uno misma, gracias a sus ahorros pudo comprarse una mototaxi con la que ahora trabaja su esposo. Su sueño es poder tener un capital y poder abrir una pasamanería y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Nancy is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de Cocharcas”. She is 39 years old, married, and has five children. Nancy sells toys and learned the trade from her mother since she was in this type of business. She travels to Lima and brings back toys to distribute from store to store.

Nancy is requesting a loan to invest in more merchandise. Nancy enjoys FINCA because she has learned values and how to love oneself. Thanks to her savings, she was able to buy a motorcycle taxi and now her husband can work. Her dreams include having capital, opening a decoration shop, and seeing her children become professionals.

loans.use: Purchase a variety of toys

loans.name: Amor Y Amistad 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Martire is the coordinator of his group Amor y Amistad 3 & 4 (Love and Peace). He makes his home here in a simple structure with his long-term partner and their two children.

Martire is excited to be taking his 12th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid his previous loan and developed his business. He has had his business for around 7 years, starting with the first loan he received from Esperanza, after some neighbors invited him to join the group. He plans to use this loan to invest in his business by purchasing pounds of fish and chicken and to buy coconuts to sell their water. He will continuing using his business profits to provide a better life for his family by building their house and having warm food, clothing and other needs. 

Martire's  story is representative of his group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. His group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsula with a burgeoning tourism industry. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: to buy fish, coconut and chicken

loans.name: Amira  Saturnina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Amira Saturnina; ella tiene 34 años de edad, separada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia tiene su negocio de venta de ropa americana, la socia tiene su puesto en la feria de los sábados que lleva el nombre de “baratillo”, la socia también vende a sus amistades que le hacen pedido, la socia a la vez trabaja para una fábrica de lácteos ella trabaja de  lunes a viernes por las mañanas y de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante que es lo mas quiere.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más mercadería de ropa y así poder tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta forma ganar más dinero.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "MUJERES UNIDAS" (United Women) communal bank which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Ammira Saturnina is 34 years old and separated with two children.  She sells American clothing at a stand at the Saturday "bargain" market and also takes orders from friends.  And she works mornings, Monday through Friday, in a dairy products plant in order to bring in more income for her family.

She plans to use the loan to buy a wider range of clothing so she can offer more variety to customers and earn more income.

She is very grateful for the loan and is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy a broader variety of clothing for retail sale to increase earnings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Apartment/home rental

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen de cocharcas, tiene 46 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Se dedica a la fabrica de tejas, Victoria y su esposo juntaron un capital y compraron terreno en la Comunidad de Acos Vinchos, ahí se dedican a la fabricación de tejas, vienen de todas parte y le compran, ahora ha bajado un poco el negocio por la temporada de lluvia. Solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en la compra de leña, pago al peón. A Victoria le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal por la capacitaciones, por los créditos que le dan y porque puede ahorrar. Su sueño es que su negocio siga prosperando y que sus hijos terminen sus estudios superiores.
texts.en: Victoria is a member of the Virgen de Cocharcas community bank. She is 46 years old, married, and has 4 children. She manufactures tiles. Victoria and her husband gathered their money and bought land in the community of Acos Vinchos, and there they manufacture tiles. People come from all over to buy them. Business has slowed down a little now because of the rainy season. She is requesting a loan that she will use to purchase firewood, paying a worker. Victoria enjoys her community bank's meetings for the trainings, the loans they give her, and because she saves money. Her dream is for her business to continue prospering and for her children to finish their higher education.

loans.use: To purchase firewood

loans.name: Sandra Yaneth

texts.es:
Sandra Yaneth es una empresaria que vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en una finca en el municipio del Cármen de Viboral en el Oriente Antioqueño, ella y su esposo se desempeña como administradores de una finca en la que hacen diferentes oficios del campo y esto les ayuda a su sustento diario.

Esta empresaria en sus ratos libres es una vendedora de diferentes productos como ropa y cosméticos por catálogo, esta labor se la aprendió a su tío que lleva toda su vida como vendedor.

Sandra con las ventas de sus productos le ayuda a sus hijos y a su esposo a mejora su calidad de vida, por esto ella necesita el crédito para así poder invertir en más mercancía y ampliar su negocio a clientes nuevos.
texts.en:
Sandra Yaneth is an entrepreneur who lives with her husband and two children on a farm in the municipality of Cármen de Viboral in Oriente Antioqueño. She and her husband work as administrators on a farm in which they perform different farm duties, which helps them with their daily needs.

During her free time, this entrepreneur sells various products, like clothing and cosmetics, by catalog. She learned this trade from her uncle, who has been a salesman his entire life.

With her sales, Sandra helps her children and husband to improve their quality of life, which is why she needs this loan so that she can invest in more merchandise and expand her business with new customers.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; ella tiene 40 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia se dedica al negocio de venta de paneles electrónicos para que puedan colgar cualquier tipo de publicidad en estos paneles, está es la única actividad que realiza la socia y mediante este trabajo ella puede sacar a su familia adelante, la socia espera poder agrandar un poco mas este negocio y así brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mas paneles electrónicos y comprar algunos productos de primera necesidad para su hogar.  

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "MUJERES UNIDAS" (United Women) communal bank located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Juana is 40 years old, lives in a common-law situation and has four children.  She sells electronic noticeboards for advertising purposes.  This is the only job she has and only source of income for her family.  She wants to increase business and provide a better lifestyle for her children.

She plans to use the loan to buy more noticeboards and other basic need items for her household.

She is very grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy electronic noticeboards and other basic needs items for the household

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, es empleado, vive en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, tiene 34 años de edad, su familia está conformada por su esposa y dos hijos de 7 y 4 años de edad, tienen casa propia pero no está en buenas condiciones, Julio trabaja como motorista pero su sueldo no le alcanza para poder ahorrar y trabajar por mejorar las condiciones de la vivienda.
Por el momento solicita un préstamo para comprar láminas y madera para construir una champa, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar las instalaciones  y la vistosidad de su vivienda, ya que lo que busca el hacer un corredor.
Su objetivo es mejorar económicamente para cubrir sus necesidades básicas de una forma más constante y poder ayudar a sus hijos con los estudios.
texts.en:
Julio is employed and lives in El Transito, in the San Miguel department. He is 34 years old and his family is comprised of his wife and two children ages 7 and 4. They own a house, but it is not in good condition. Julio works as a motorist, but his wages are not enough for him to save for home improvement.

At this time, he is requesting a loan in order to purchase metal sheets and lumber to build a hut. This loan will help him improve the look and condition of his house since he is looking to make a corridor.

His goal is to improve financially in order to cover his basic necessities in a more stable manner, and to be able to help his children with their studies.

loans.use: Purchase metal sheets and lumber

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yolanda; ella tiene 38 años de edad, casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia se dedica al negocio de venta de desayunos en un puesto que tiene en la esquina de su casa ella vende kinua,maca,leche entre otros más ,la socia lleva en este negocio ya un par de años siendo esta la única actividad que realiza por el momento espera poder encontrar otro tipo de trabajo,por el momento se siente bien con el negocio que está realizando ya que le permite estar más tiempo con sus hijos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como kinua, azúcar, canela, leche, entre otros más para así poder abastecer su negocio. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "MUJERES UNIDAS" (United Women) communal bank which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Yolanda is 38 years old and married with five children.  She sells breakfast consisting of quinoa, ginseng, milk and other items out of a stand set up in her home.  She has been running this business, which is the only work she has, for a few years.  She hopes to find another type of job but in the meantime she is happy with what she does because it allows her to spend more time with her children.

This member plans to use the loan to buy ingredients for her business, such as quinoa, sugar, cinnamon, milk and other items.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as quinoa, sugar, cinnamon, milk and other items for her business

loans.name: 13 De Enero Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “13 DE ENERO” es un grupo de 8 mujeres que han decidido unirse para recibir crédito, capacitación y atención en salud,  serán parte del centro focal de Germán Busch, ellas están iniciando su primer ciclo.

Cada una de las socias tiene negocio propio, de servicio, producción o comercio. Entre ellos tenemos: venta de venestas escolares, venta de sobres, elaboración de polleras, venta de cocinas a gas, venta de varios, costura de polleras, venta de cocinas a gas, cerrajería..

Para su organización, la B. C. 13 de Enero cuenta con una mesa directiva integrada por una presidenta, la señora  Flora, una tesorera, la señora  Margarita y una secretaria de actas, la señora  Ana.

La  Presidenta, la señora  Flora vive con su esposo y uno de sus tres hijos (los otros dos hijos ya han conformado su hogar) la señora Flora está en el negocio de la costura de polleras, ella tiene este trabajo desde hace veinte años.   La costura de las polleras se realizan en su domicilio de acuerdo al pedido que le hagan sus clientes, en caso de que la demanda fuera mayor, le colabora su yerna .  
El préstamo solicitado por la señora presidenta, doña Flora fue por Bs.2000.- y será destinado para la compra de tela bongé.

La señora Flora indica que esta es su primera experiencia como socia de Pro Mujer,  cuando se le consulta que es lo que le atrae de la institución, ella responde “el crédito rápido y ahorrar”.
texts.en:
The "13 DE ENERO" Communal Bank is a group of 8 women who have decided to join together to receive loans, training, and medical attention. They will be a part of the Germán Busch headquarters in their first loan cycle. 
Each of these group members has her own business: service, production, or retail. Among them are school supplies, envelopes, skirt production, gas stoves, general goods, skirt sewing, and locksmith services. 
In terms of its organization, this communal bank has its own board of directors; Ms. Flora, the president, Ms. Margarita, the treasurer, and Ms. Ana, the secretary. 
The president, Ms. Flora, lives with her husband and one of her three children (the other two have already started their own households). Ms. Flora has been sewing skirts for a living for 20 years. She makes the skirts by special order in her home. When the orders are bigger, her daughter-in-law gives her a hand. 
The president,doña Flora, requested a loan amount of 2,000.00 BOB, which will be used to purchase bongé fabric. 
Ms. Flora states that this is her first experience as a member of Pro Mujer. When asked what attracts her most about the institute, she responded, "The fast loan and the savings."

loans.use: Purchase fabric

loans.name: Doris Marlendi

texts.es: Doris Marlendi tienwe 25 años es una persona responsable, es casada con Samuel Gonzalez, ella se dedica a la venta de maiz por mayor y otros productos como alfrecho,etc es una que es muy reconocida por sus clientes por su amavilidad con que trata a su clientes ella dice que su credito lo esta solicitando para la compra de maiz por mayor ya que desea agrandar mas sus ventas y tener mejores ingresos para poder ayudar a su esposo con el sustento de su hogar ella esta agradecida con Fape y kiva porue le han ayudado mucho con los creditos ya que por medio de ello ella a podido agrandar mas su negocio su sueño es poder tener mas bariedad en producto para responder a la demanda que sus clientes le hacen ella esta segura que con la ayuda de Dios lo ba a lograr.
texts.en: Doris Marlendi is a responsible 25-year-old woman who is married to Samuel Gonzalez. She sells corn wholesale, as well as other products like bran, etc. She is very well-known by her customers for her kindness that she shows them. She states that she is requesting this loan to purchase corn wholesale because she would like to increase sales and earn a higher income so that she can help her husband support their household. She is grateful to Fape and Kiva because they have helped her a lot with these loans since she has been able to expand her business. Her dream is to be able to offer a greater variety of products to meet customer demand. She is sure that she will achieve this with the help of God.

loans.use: Purchase wholesale corn

loans.name: Amor Y Amistad 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Yolanda is one of the members of the Amor y Amistad 1 & 2 (Love and Peace) group. They are located in Samana, where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. Her story is representative of both her group and Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients in general. Yolanda is a young, dedicated woman who sells gasoline on the main road of her village, in a rural community surrounded by forests and coasts, in the beautiful peninsula of Samana.

Yolanda is excited about seeking her 12th loan with Esperanza. She has been in various businesses for more than 6 years, selling clothing, miscellaneous products and bread. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business of gasoline sales by purchasing some gallons of motor oil and gasoline to sell by the bottle. She says that after she started to do business, she felt more freedom to access everything in her community and town.

loans.use: to buy gasoline

loans.name: Juan Angel

texts.es:
Don Juan, tiene 44 años de edad, administra una tienda, vive solo en la Ciudad de San Miguel, él es soltero, se dedica a atender una tienda que la tiene ubicada al frente de una escuela, lugar propicio para tener un buen número de clientes ya que todos estudiantes forman parte de los clientes frecuentes, él les ofrece galletas, jugos, dulces, entre otros que los niños buscan, también tiene productos para el hogar, su horario de atención es de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Actualmente, en vista que está por iniciar  el año escolar el solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería y abastecer la tienda de aquellos productos que son demandados por los jóvenes estudiantes, esta inversión le ayudara a prepararse para atender de una mejor manera a los clientes y aprovechar cada venta para generar ganancias.
Su proyección es lograr crecer en el negocio y estabilizar sus ingresos para tener mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Don Juan, age 44, runs a store. He lives on his own in the city of San Miguel. He is single and manages a store that is located in front of a school, an ideal location for having many customers because students frequent the place. He sells them cookies, juice, candy and other products that they want. He also sells household products. His business hours are 7:00 am to 4:00 pm.

Currently, because the school year is about to start, he is requesting a loan so that he can purchase merchandise and restock his store with all those products that are in high demand with students. This investment will help him prepare to provide better customer service and make the most out of each sale to generate profits.

His plan is to expand his business and stabilize his income to improve his financial situation.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es: El señor Iván dedicado al servicio de transporte urbano con  mini bus se dedica a esta actividad  hace bastante tiempo realiza este trabajo rutinario  durante todo el día para así cubrir los gastos de la familia, ya trabajo anteriormente con la institución esta es su segunda secuencia demostrando responsabilidad con el pago de sus cuotas, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito, solicito este  crédito para poder cambiar todo el interior de su mini bus  para así otorgar un mejor servicio a sus pasajeros, es una persona muy amable y muy trabajadora, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado, en la foto el Sr. esta acompañado con su esposa.
texts.en: Iván works providing urban transport services with a minibus. He has pursued this activity for a long time. He carries out his work routine all day, so that he can cover his family's expenses. He has already worked with the institution in the past, and this is his second loan cycle. He has demonstrated responsibility in making his payments. He reports that his previous loan was helpful for him. He is requesting the current loan so that he can replace the entire interior of his minibus, in order to provide better service to his passengers. He is a very likable and hard-working person, and he is grateful to the institution for the support provided to him. In the photo, he is accompanied by his wife.

loans.use: Repairing the interior of his vehicle

loans.name: Nidia Susana

texts.es: Nidia Susana: es madre de 2 niños el primero de 10 años y el segundo de 5 años ambos estudian el mismo municipio, Susana se dedica a la venta de ropa interior negocio que la mama le heredo desde hace 8 años ya que ellas vendían en las calles del municipio, con el tiempo ella decidió poner un local en la misma casa por lo que ahora solicita un crédito ya que para esta temporada se necesita de mas capital para poder comprar más ropa y así poder surtir su negocio es la primera vez que solicita un crédito con fape pero promete ser puntual en los pagos además estaría muy agradecida si se le diera la oportunidad ya que el sueño de ella es poder distribuir mas ropa en distintos puntos del municipio.
texts.en:
Nidia Susana is the mother of two children, ages 10 and 5 years old.  They both study in the same town.  Susana has a lingerie business that she took over from her mother eight years ago.  They used to conduct business in the town streets but some time ago she decided to sell out of her own home.

She is now requesting a loan to buy more seasonal items and increase her inventory.  This is the first loan she is requesting through FAPE and she is committed to paying it back on time.  She is very grateful for this opportunity since her dream is to be able to distribute her clothing in other areas around the town.

loans.use: To buy lingerie for retail sales

loans.name: Jose Concepcion

texts.es:
José de 32 años, reside en Usulután, ahí vive con su esposa y 5 hijos, tienen casa propia, él es vendedor de productos domésticos en un vehículo donde se transporta a los pueblos cercanos a ofrecer la mercadería, también provee para negocios de la ciudad de Usulután.
Este negocio es la fuente de ingresos con la que cuentan su esposa e hijos, con las ganancias logran cubrir los gastos mensuales; por el momento está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería  y mantener fuerte el inventario del negocio, con este préstamo podrá fortalecer y crecer con su negocio, así mismo ofrecer variedad de productos para los clientes, ya que el comercializa en su vehículo dulces de toda clase, productos de cocina como condimentos, vinagres, y materiales detergentes.
Su aspiración es mejorar los ingresos para satisfacer las necesidades prioritarias de su familia, también desea darle a sus hijos los estudios necesarios para que puedan superarse y mejorar su vida.
texts.en:
José is 32 years old and lives in Usulután with his wife and five children.  He has his own home and sells household items out of his truck which he drives to nearby towns.  He also supplies to businesses in the city of Usulután.

This business activity is the sole income for his family, allowing them to cover monthly expenses.  He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise and maintain a high inventory.  The loan will help him strengthen and grow his business and will allow him to offer a variety of products to his customers.  He sells all kinds of sweets and kitchen products such as condiments, vinager, and detergent.

He aspires to improving his income so he can meet his family's priority needs.  He also wants to give his children the necessary education so they can be successful and have a quality lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy sweets and kitchen items

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: La  señora Marina dedicada a la venta de productos en su tienda de barrio, la señora  se encuentra durante todo el día en su domicilio atendiendo el negocio de esta manera también puede estar con sus hijos para alimentarlos y solucionar algún problema que ellos lleguen a tener. La tiendita que atiende es bastante concurrido por el buen trato que emite doña marina. Debido  a la demanda la señora piensa ampliar su negocio para satisfacer de mejor manera a todos los clientes que frecuenten su venta por este motivo solicito el crédito para la compra de mercadería como aceite, arroz, azúcar, fideo, galletas, etc. es una persona joven muy trabajadora, con ganas de superación, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Marina sells products out the small store located in her home.  She spends the entire day attending to her business in order to provide an income for her children and take care of any problem they might have.

The store is very busy because Doña Marina provides great service.  Because of the high demand she wants to expand her business and provide the best for her customers.  She is requesting the loan to buy more goods such as oil, rice, sugar, pasta, cookies, etc.  She is a very hard-working young person who wants to succeed.  She is very grateful to the institution for the support she has received.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for retail sale

loans.name: Lidy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lidy; ella tiene 31 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, la socia confecciona la ropa al gusto del cliente ella trabaja desde su casa a pedido, la socia a la vez también trabaja en un jardín de auxiliar pero ahora está de vacaciones así que se puede dedicar a lleno a confeccionar mas ropa y así poder generar más ingresos para su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de una maquina remayadora para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "MUJERES UNIDAS" (United Women) communal bank which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Lidy is 31 years old, and is in a common-law relationship, with two children.  She sells women's, men's and children's clothing which she sews at home based on orders she receives from customers.  She also works as a gardener assistant.  She is now on vacation and can spend all her time sewing clothes and generating income for the family.

She plans to use the loan to buy an overlock sewing machine for her business.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy an overlock sewing machine for her business

loans.name: Mercedes De Jesus

texts.es:
Doña Mercedes, de 62 años, se dedica a comprar y vender pollos y cerdos, ella vive con su esposo y dos hijas de 18 y 25 años de edad, residen en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel. El negocio fue fundado junto a su esposo desde hace 40 años, trabaja todos los días de 4:00am a 6:00pm, la distribución para comercializar la realiza en el mercado municipal de San Miguel, una de sus hijas le ayuda a trasladarse al mercado y vender los pollos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar gallinas, con esta inversión ella quiere crecer con su granja y seguir proveyendo para su hogar ganancias que solventen necesidades y les permita mejorar su condición actual.
Su aspiración es mantenerse a largo plazo con el negocio, que sus hijas puedan estudiar hasta superarse y mantener unida a toda su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Mercedes is 62 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters, ages 18 and 25.  She lives in San Rafael Oriente in the department of San Miguel.  She buys and sells chickens and pigs and has been working in the business with her husband for 40 years.  She works from 4:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  

She sells her poultry at the municipal market in San Miguel, with the help of one of her daughters.  She is requesting a loan to buy hens.  She wants to expand her farm and continue providing an income for her household so she can meet needs and improve her family's lifestyle.

Her dream is keep her business going so she can help her daughters study and be successful and to keep the family together.

loans.use: To buy poultry

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nieves; ella tiene 37 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se dedica al negocio de restaurante ella brinda los servicios de desayunos, almuerzo y cena, la socia trabaja todos los días desde las 06:00am hasta las 07:00pm la socia cuanta con el apoyo de su esposo para la realización de los menus, la socia es una persona bien optimista y de esta forma saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más insumos para su negocio como arroz, aceite, huevos, carne entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Nieves, 37, is a member of the MUJERES UNIDAS community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.  

Sra. Nieves is married and has 2 children.  She operates a restaurant business for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  She works every day from 6:00am to 7:00pm.  Her husband helps her with the menu.  She is an optimistic woman, a characteristic that has helped both her and her family.

Sra. Nieves will use this loan to buy supplies for the restaurant: rice, cooking oil, eggs and meat, among other things.

Sra. Nieves is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it on time.

loans.use: Buy supplies for restaurant business.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge Luis tiene 31 años, su actividad es una pulpería y compra y venta de cerdos. Hace más de 15 años que tiene este negocio, inicio este medio de vida desde muy joven con el objetivo de generar ingresos para su hogar, tiene 3 hijos menores a su cargo por lo que siempre ha disfrutado de este medio de vida es una padre responsable. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de cerdos y alimentos pues actualmente quiere satisfacer la demanda.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis is 31 years old.  He has a grocery store and also buys and sells pigs.  He has been in the business for over 15 years and has been working hard since he was very young to provide an income for his family.  He has three minor children and is a very responsible father.

He is requesting the loan to buy pigs and feed, since he wants to be able to meet the high demand that currently exists.

loans.use: For working capital

loans.name: Luciano Antonio

texts.es:
Luciano de profesión agricultor desde mucho tiempo ha trabajo en conjunto con su familia en la tierra de su finca de donde ha obtenido sus bienes. Tiene dentro de sus proyectos la construcción de su vivienda cerca de la finca así cuidar mejor la cosecha de los robos que se dan de los productos. Inicio a la falta de empleo en el país, siendo de gran beneficio ya que emprendo en el camino de tener su propio negocio. Se ha visto afectado con plagas y robo en la zona de la cosecha. 
Con el préstamo que solicitad lo invertirá en la compra de insumo y fertilizante obtenido mejores productos para vender. Con un gran agradecimiento a la financiera ya que del préstamo brindado el mejorara su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Luciano is a farmer.  He has worked on the land, along with his family, for many years and the farm is his main source of income.  One of his projects is a plan to build a house near the farm so that he can better protect his crops from the thieves who steal from him.  Sadly, thievery and crop disease are common in the area.  Given the lack of employment in the country, this investment should be considered worthwhile. 

Luciano will use the loan to buy fertilizers and other supplies for the farm so that he can ultimately get a better return on his crop.  He is very grateful for the loan because it will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: Buy fertilizers and other supplies for farming business.

loans.name: Manzanitas Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “MANZANITAS” es un grupo de 10 mujeres que ha decidido unirse para solicitar crédito y además recibir capacitación y atención en salud,  serán parte del centro focal de Panamericana, ellas están iniciando su primer ciclo.

Cada una de las socias tiene negocio propio, de servicio, producción o comercio. 
Para su organización, la B. C. Manzanitas cuenta con una mesa directiva integrada por una presidenta, la señora  Isidora, una tesorera, la señora  Alejandra y una secretaria de actas, la señora  Sonia.

La  Presidenta, la señora  Isidora vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos,  la señora Isidoro está en el negocio de la venta de  queso, ella tiene este trabajo desde hace treinta y cinco años.   El negocio fue aprendido de su mamá,  trae queso de poblaciones cercanas, como Peñas y Los Andes y los vende en la Ciudad de La Paz, en la Feria de la Garita de Lima.  En cuanto a la venta, recibe la colaboración de su hija.  
El préstamo solicitado fue por Bs.2000.- y será destinado para la compra de más queso.

La señora Isidora indica que esta es su primera experiencia como socia de Pro Mujer,  cuando se le consulta que es lo que le  gusta de la institución, ella responde “la capacitación”.
texts.en:
The Manzanitas community bank is a group of ten women who have decided to come together to request a loan and also receive training and health services.  They are beginning their first loan cycle and will work within the Panamericana regional office. 

Each of the group's members has her own business in services, production or commerce.  The bank is run by a board of directors which is made up of a president (Isidora), a treasurer (Alejandra) and a secretary (Sonia).

The group's president, Isidora, lives with her husband and four children.  Her business is selling cheese and she has been in this business for thirty five years, having learned the trade from her mom.  Isidora buys her cheese from nearby towns such as Peñas and Los Andes and then sells it at La Garita de Lima Market in the city of La Paz.  Her daughter helps her to make her sales.

Isidora requested a loan for 2,000 bolivianos which will be used to buy more cheese.

Isidora says that this is her first experience as a member of Pro Mujer.  When we asked her what she likes about the institution, she replied "the training".

loans.use: To buy cheese

loans.name: Ivan Mario

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES  UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Iván Mario; el tiene 22 años de edad y es soltero; el socio tiene su carrito una combi el  brinda el servicio urbano dentro de la ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por las mañanas y tardes siendo esta la única actividad que realiza por el momento y espera tal vez mas adelante estudiar alguna carrera pero primero quiere capitalizarse un poco más para así poder estudiar algo en el futuro. El socio es una persona bien optimista y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar accesorios para su carro y para realizar el mantenimiento de este.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Ivan Mario, 22, is a member of the MUJERES UNIDAS community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

Sr. Ivan Mario is single.  He owns a small vehicle called a combi that he uses to taxi passengers around the city.  He works every day, mornings and afternoons, because the business is, for now, his only source of income.  He hopes to study for some career or other in the future, but he needs to save some money first to afford it.  He is an optimistic person with a strong desire to get ahead in the world.

Sr. Ivan Mario will use the loan to buy accessories for his vehicle and to make repairs to it.

Sr. Ivan Mario is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it on time.

loans.use: Repair vehicle for taxi business.

loans.name: Esfuerso De Dios Group

texts.es: Las dos integrantes del grupo quienes son Natalia y Elsa  La primera de ellas quien es Natalia se dedica a vender tamales y Chuchitos todos los días en el mercado del municipio, y los fines de semana tiene varios puestos en distintos lugares lo que le permite agrandar su mercado, Elsa se dedica a bordar blusas típicas que luego las vende en el mercado, las dos han trabajado por mucho tiempo con fape y han demostrado su responsabilidad y puntualidad en los pagos por lo que solicitan otro crédito para poder comprar productos para elavorar tamales  ya que desean que su familia prospere al igual que ellas.
texts.en:
The two members of this group are Natalia and Elsa. The first, Natalia, sells tamales and chuchitos [food similar to tamales] every day in the municipal market. On the weekends, she has various stalls in different locations. This allows her to expand her market.

Elsa embroiders traditional blouses and sells them in the market. The two have worked with Fape for a long time, and have demonstrated their responsibility and punctuality in their payments. They are requesting another loan in order to be able to purchase products for making tamales, since they want their families to prosper along with them.

loans.use: the purchase of products for making tamales

loans.name: Reyna Aquilina

texts.es: Reyna Aquilina tiene 39 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 15 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy responsable. Ella inicio este medio de vida por su Mama ya que anteriormente se dedicaba a este negocio, Reyna se ha caracterizado por ser una muy buena cliente ya que el pago de sus cuotas las realiza en tiempo y forma se encuentra muy contenta con este financiamiento que lo utilizara para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, gaseosas, pan, granos básicos entre otros.
texts.en: Reyna Aquilina is 39. She sells general merchandise. She has had this business for over 15 years, during which time she has proven herself to be a very responsible person. She started this work because of her mother, who had this business previously. Reyna has been a very good client, as she pays her quotas on time and completely. She is very happy to have this loan, which she will use for the purchase of candies, drinks, pop, bread, and basic grains, among other items.

loans.use: working capital; the purchase of candies, drinks, pop, bread, and basic grains, among other items.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES  UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. David; el tiene 41 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; el socio tiene su negocio de carpintería el realiza puertas, ventanas, muebles, armarios entre otros mas, el tiene su negocio en su misma casa, el socio lleva años en este negocio y de esta forma el saca a su familia adelante, la socia es una persona bien optimista y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por sus hijos.

El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar herramientas menores para su negocio.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “MUJERES  UNIDAS” [Women United] communal bank. The bank is located in the Cuzco district, belonging to the province and department of Cuzco. 

The member is David. He is 41 years old and in a common law marriage and a father of 4. He has a carpentry business where he makes doors, windows, furniture, and closets, among other things. He has his business in his own home and has had it for years. This is the way that he gets his family ahead. He is a very optimistic person who really wants to get ahead for his children.   

The member is asking for the loan tobuy small tools for his business. 

He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: The member is asking for the loan to buy small tools for his business.

loans.name: Erik Enmanuel

texts.es:
Erick es agricultor, casado con apoyo de su padre inicio el negocio de cultivar y vender su producto. Como planes tiene a la construcción de una pila receptora de agua potable. En la trayectoria que tiene como agricultor se le presento dificultades como robo de la cosecha. 
Agradece a la institución ya que con este ciclo de préstamo lo utilizara para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes, obteniendo productos de mejor calidad y mayores utilidades para invertirlo en los proyectos, mejorando su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Erick is a farmer. He is married and with his father's support started his business growing and selling his products. He plans are the construction of a potable water tower. During his time as a farmer he has faced difficulties such as the theft of his harvest. 
 
He is grateful to the institution since he will use this loan cycle to buy fertilizer and materials, obtaining better quality products and more profit to invest in projects, improving his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and materials

loans.name: Felipa Danelia

texts.es: Felipa Danelia tiene 49 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 8 años que tiene este negocio, pues siempre ha buscado la forma de salir adelante tiene 3 hijos de los cuales solamente 1 está a su cargo. Ella es una persona muy luchadora que ha salido adelante con todas las dificultades que ha enfrentado como es ciertos problemas de salud. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como telas, cosméticos, calzado entre otros. Sueña con finalizar su carrera y poder seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Felipa Danelia is 49. She sells general merchandise. She has had this business for over 8 years, and has always been looking for ways to succeed. She has three children, of whom only one is under her care. She is a very hard-working person who has surmounted all of the challenges she has encountered, such as certain health problems.
She will use this loan for the purchase of basic material, such as fabrics, cosmetics, and shoes, among other items. She dreams of finishing her degree and succeeding.

loans.use: working capital; the purchase of basic material, such as fabrics, cosmetics, and shoes, among other items.

loans.name: Henrry Marcelino

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES  UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Henrry Marcelino; el tiene 36 años de edad es conviviente; el socio se dedica a la construcción él trabaja en cada diferente obra que le solicitan y de esta manera el socio saca a su familia adelante, es la única actividad que realiza el socio por el momento y espera aperturar un nuevo negocio que signifique un nuevo ingreso para el futuro, por ahora está trabajando duro para ahorrar algo más de dinero. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar una mezcladora para su trabajo y algunas veces alquilarlo a alguna obra.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Mujeres Unidas" ["United Women"] communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Mr Henry Marcelino. He is 36 and lives with his partner. He works in construction, on every job that is offered. This is how he supports his family. This is his only source of income at the moment, and he hopes to open a new business as a new source of income in the future. At the moment he is working hard to save more money.

He is requesting this loan to purchase a mixer which he will use for his work and also rent out sometimes.

He is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of the quotas.

loans.use: to purchase a mixer for his work, and also for renting out sometimes.

loans.name: Flor Imelda

texts.es: LA SEÑORA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ROPA YA HACE AÑOS ELLA TIENE 25 AÑOS ELLA VENDE ROPA DE TODA CLASE PARA CABALLERO, DAMA Y PARA NIÑOS ELLA DISE QUE NECECITA TENER MAS CAPITAL PARA TRABAJAR POR ESO SOLICITA ESTE CREDITO PARA COMPRAR MAS MERCADERIA EN ROPA PARA VENDER EN SU TIENDA ESPERA QUE FAPE LE AYUDE PARA SEGUIR AVANSANDO Y CRECIENDO EN SU NEGOCIO Y ASI PODER TENER MAS OPORTUNIDADES PARA DARLE EDUCACION A SU HIJO Y TAMBIEN PODER AYUDAR A SU ESPOSO CON EL SUSTENTO DE SU HOGAR LE AGRADESE A DIOS POR ABER ENCONTRADO ESTA INTITUCION QUE LE PUEDA AYUDAR A PROSPERAR EN SU NEGOCIO
texts.en:
Flor has sold clothing for several years. She is 25 and sells all types of clothing for women, men and children. She says that she needs more capital for her business, and so she is requesting this loan to purchase more merchandise in clothing to sell in her store. She hopes that Fape will help her so that she can continue advancing and expanding her business, thus having more opportunities to provide her child with an education, and to help her husband with the household costs.
She thanks God that she found this institution that can help her to prosper in her business.

loans.use: the wholesale purchase of clothing

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sonia; ella tiene 45 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se dedica a la venta de ropa que ella misma confecciona como vestidos, pantalones para damas y ropa para niños, la socia trabaja desde su casa a pedido, esta es una actividad que siempre le gusto y se siente feliz ya que está trabajando en algo que le gusta y a la vez le llena de satisfacciones una de ella es económica el cual le sirve para pagar sus deudas pendientes y comprar cosas q necesita.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio como hilos, telas, reglas de costura entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Mujeres Unidas ["United Women"] communal bank. The bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Sonia. She is 45, lives with her partner, and has 2 children. She sells clothing that she makes herself, such as dresses and skirts for women and clothing for children. She works from home, filling orders. This is a job that she has always enjoyed and she is happy to be working in something that she likes. It fills her with satisfaction and provides her with an income to pay off her debt and purchase things that she needs.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of materials for her business such as threads, fabric and sewing rulers, among other items.

She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of her quotas.

loans.use: The member is requesting this loan for the purchase of materials for her business such as threads, fabric, and sewing rulers among other items.

loans.name: Yanaptasiñani Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “YANAPTASIÑANI” es un grupo de 7 mujeres y u1 varon que han decidido unirse para recibir crédito, capacitación y atención en salud,  serán parte del centro focal de Juan Pablo II, ellos están iniciando su primer ciclo.

Cada una de las socias tiene negocio propio, de servicio, producción o comercio. Entre ellos tenemos: pensión, venta de dulces y refresco, tienda de barrio, chofer, venta de CD´s, venta de productos de Belleza, venta de fruta.

Para su organización, la B. C. Yanaptasiñani cuenta con una mesa directiva integrada por una presidenta, la señora  Naty, una tesorera, la señora  Nancy y una secretaria de actas, la señora  Rosa.

La  Presidenta, la señora  Naty vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos (los tres hijos ya han conformado su hogar) la señora Naty tiene desde hace cinco años una tienda de abarrotes, también vende huevo, gaseosas.  Sin embargo, ella comenta que antes contaba con una pequeña tienda en su domicilio y estuvo con ella durante quince años, hasta que se decidió por abrir una tienda en un lugar más comercial.

La señora Naty atiende el negocio desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche, con la ayuda de su hija.

El préstamo solicitado por la señora Naty fue por Bs.2000.- y será destinado para la compra de huevo.

La señora Naty indica que esta es su primera experiencia como socia de Pro Mujer,  cuando se le consulta que es lo que le atrae de la institución, ella responde “participar en el grupo”.
texts.en:
The “YANAPTASIÑANI” communal bank is a group of seven women and one man who have decided to join together to get loans, training and health care. They will be part of the Juan Pablo II central office. They are starting their first cycle.

Each one of the members has their own business, in service, production, or merchandise. Among them, they are: a guesthouse; a candy and drinks sales business; a corner store; a driver; a CD sales business; a beauty product business; and a fruit sales business.
For its organization, the Yanaptasiñani community bank has a board of directors made up of a president (Mrs. Naty), a treasurer (Mrs. Nancy), and a secretary (Mrs. Rosa).

The president, Mrs Naty, lives with her husband and three children.  Naty has had a grocery store for five years, and she also sells eggs and pop. She tells us that she once had a small store in her home for fifteen years, until she decided to open a store in a more commercial area.

Naty tends to her business from 6:00 am until 11:00 pm, with her daughter's help.

The loan Naty requested is for 2000 Bs--and it will be used for the purchase of eggs.

Naty says that this is her first experience as a Pro Mujer client. When asked what attracts her to the institution, she responded "participating in the group".

loans.use: the purchase of eggs

loans.name: Martha Irene

texts.es: Martha Irene tiene 48 años, ella se dedica es una comedor y bar pues con el tiempo es que ha logrado salir adelante y mejorar los ingresos de su hogar. Tiene más de 8 años en este negocio, la buena administración de su negocio y los clientes que siempre llegan a comprar los diferentes productos que ofrece.   Se levanta temprano todos los días para realizar sus labores del hogar y al mismo tiempo empezar a ofrecer sus servicios en su local. El financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, licor, frutas, verduras y carnes en general.
texts.en:
Martha is 48 years old and she is dedicated to her restaurant-bar.  Over time, Martha has forged ahead and improved her household income.  She has operated this business for more than eight years, due to her good administration and customers who always return to purchase the different products she offers.

Martha rises early every morning to carry out household chores and, at the same time, to begin to offer services at her stall.  The financing is for buying basic grains, liquor, fruit, vegetables and meat in general.

loans.use: BUYING FOOD AND BEVERAGE SUPPLIES FOR HER RESTAURANT-BAR

loans.name: Miluska

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Miluska; ella tiene 30 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia tiene su carrito (combi) que brinda servicio público todos los días por el centro de la ciudad, la socia lleva la administración de este carro y su pareja es quien maneja el carro. La socia es la única actividad que realiza por otro lado ella se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos y de su casa, la socia se siente feliz ya que mediante este negocio ella puede estar más tiempo con sus hijos. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para reparar el motor de su  carro y para realizar el mantenimiento de este mismo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Miluska belongs to the Mujeres Unidas ["United Women"] communal bank. The bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 30, lives with her partner, and has one child. She has her own little vehicle (a combi van) with which she offers a public service every day in the city center. She is in charge of running the business and her partner drives. This is her only job with income, though she does care for her children and her home. She is happy that she is able to spend more time with her children with this business.

She is requesting this loan to repair the motor of her car and for further maintenance.

She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of the quotas.

loans.use: She is requesting this loan to repair her car's motor and for further car maintenance.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gloria; ella tiene 20 años de edad, soltera; La socia tiene su negocio de venta de ropa para niños y damas, la socia lleva un buen tiempo en este negocio, ella tiene su stand en el comercial El Molino, la socia trae ropa de Desaguadero frontera con Bolivia y a veces viaja hasta Lima para traer mas mercadería, la socia espera más adelante poder estudiar alguna carrera profesional pero por el momento quiere capitalizarse más.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como pantalones, chompas, polos, camisas entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gloria belongs to the Mujeres Unidas ["United Women"] communal bank. The bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 20 and single. She has had a business selling clothing for women and children for some time. She has a stand in the El Molino market. She gets clothing from Desaguadero, on the border with Bolivia, and sometimes she travels all the way to Lima for more merchandise. She hopes to be able to obtain some sort of professional degree in the future, but at the moment she wants to make more money.

She is requesting this loan to purchase more merchandise such as pants, sweaters, polos, and shirts, among other items.

She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of her quotas.

loans.use: for the purchase of more merchandise such as pants, sweaters, polos and shirts among other items

loans.name: Floriscelda

texts.es: Floriscelda vive en su propia casa con sus 3 hijos, ella se dedica a una pulpera desde hace 5 años. Inicio porque ella decidió invertir en este medio de vida, ella se ha caracterizado por ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes y además los productos son de muy buena calidad. La mayoría de sus clientes son sus vecinos, amigos, familiares y público en general. Sueña con mejorar sus ingresos y proporciónale ciertas mejoras a su negocio. el crédito que solicita es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, granos básicos, detergentes etre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Floriscelda lives in her own house with her three children.  For some 5 years now she has been dedicated to her general store.  She began her store after deciding to invest in this means of earning a living.  

Floriscelda offers good service to her customers and, in addition, her products are of very good quality.  The majority of her customers are neighbors, friends, family members and the public in general.

Floriscelda dreams of improving her income and providing certain improvements for her business.  The loan she is requesting is to buy candy, soft drinks, bread, basic grains, and detergents, among other things.

loans.use: BUYING MERCHANDISE FOR HER GENERAL STORE

loans.name: Yosein  Sander

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES  UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Yosein Sander; el tiene 18 años de edad, soltero; el socio se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi el trabaja todos los días por las mañanas y tardes, esta es la única actividad que realiza por el momento el socio ya que más adelante espera poder estudiar alguna carrera profesional pero por ahora él desea hacer un pequeño capital para más adelante estudiar tranquilo, el socio es una persona muy perseverante y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro y para regularizar algunos documentos que le faltan de su licencia de conducir.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yosein belongs to the Mujeres Unidas ["United Women"] communal bank. The bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Yosein Sander is 18 and single. He offers a taxi service, working every day, morning and afternoon. This is the only job that he does at the moment, and in the future he hopes to be able to study for a professional degree. However, at the moment he wants to make some money for the future in order to study without worry. He is a very persevering person with a great desire to succeed.

He is requesting this loan for maintenance for his car and to legalize some documents that he needs for his driver's license.

He is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of his quotas.

loans.use: he is requesting this loan for car maintenance and to legalize some documents that he still needs for his driver's license.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: working capital; the purchase of basic materials such as shoes, clothing and cosmetics, among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For working capital

loans.name: Gladys Del Carmen

texts.es: Gladys Del Carmen tiene 38 años de edad, su actividad es venta de repostería. Hace más de 19 años que tiene este negocio, pues con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado obtenerlo. Ella es una mujer que ha luchado por salir adelante pues siempre está pendiente de generar ingresos a su hogar. Sus 2 hijos menores de edad están a su cargo, sabe que tiene que levantarse temprano para realizar las tareas del hogar y también vender sus productos pues siempre está ofreciendo una gran variedad. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como queso, mantequilla, azúcar entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Gladys Del Carmen is 38 years old. Her activity is selling pastries. She has had this business for more than 19 years, and was able to obatin it after a lot of hard work. She is a woman who has fought to get ahead and is always trying to generate income for her home. She is raising her 2 minor children and she knows she has to get up early to do the housework and to sell her products. She always offers a grear variety. The reason for the loan is to buy raw materials such as cheese, butter, sugar and more.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria se dedica a la venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio.   que ofrece a amigos y familiares, con lo cual obtiene un ingreso para su familia. Los sueños de Maria es que su hijo pueda asistir a una universidad y logre ser un buen profesional. Maria necesita un préstamo dinero que será invertido en la compra de perfumes, cremas por lo que se preocupa de generar ingresos para el alimento diario. Sueña con tener su propio medio de transporte que le facilite la entrega de sus productos.
texts.en: Maria sells cosmetics. She has had this business for more than 4 years. She offers them to her friends and relatives and obtains income for her family. Maria's dreams are for her son to go to college and have a good profession. Maria needs a loan to invest the money in buying perfumes and creams in order to generate income for her daily meals. She dreams of having her own means of transportation which will make it easier to deliver her products.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Elsa Patricia

texts.es: Elsa Patricia P. O., tiene 45 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos, y reside en el barrio San Antonio en el municipio de La Paz. Ella comenzò su negocio a raiz de que su esposo la abandono y para criar a sus hijos necesitaba una fuente de ingresos y como en el pueblo no hay empresas donde solicitar un empleo, se le ocurrio que podia comprar ropa de segunda mano y poner un pequeña venta en su domicilio.  Ademas de eso, hace dos años Elsa tiene una venta de comida en la escuela local. Sus hijos ya no representan una carga economica para ella pues trabajan pero si les ayuda con sus nietos porque los ama mucho. Elsa solicita el prestamo para comprar dos fardos de ropa de segunda mano para revenderla y uno maniquis para poder exhibirla. Con el apoyo del prestamo su vida cambiara de manera positiva porque mantendra su entrada de dinero y podra seguir sosteniendo su hogar. Su meta es poder expandir su negocio a otras comunidades cercanas y que su familia este mas unida. Es su primer ciclo en FAMA y espera poder cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual.
texts.en: Elsa Patricia P. O., age 45, is the single mother of two children. She lives in the San Antonio neighborhood of the municipality of La Paz. She started her business because her husband abandoned her, and she needed a source of income to raise her children. Since there are no companies in her village where she could look for a job, it occurred to her that she could buy secondhand clothing and set up a small shop in her home. In addition to this, for the past two years, Elsa has operated a food stand in the local school. Her children are longer an economic burden for her, since they are now working, but she helps them with her grandchildren because she loves them very much. Elsa is requesting the loan to buy two bales of secondhand clothing to resell, as well as some mannequins to display the clothing. With the help of the loan, her life will change in a positive way, because she will maintain her source of income and continue to support her household. Her goals are to expand her business to other nearby communities, and also to see her family more united. This is her first loan cycle with FAMA, and she plans to make her payments in a punctual manner.

loans.use: Buying two bales of secondhand clothing

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
El Joven E. de 26 años de edad vive actualmente con su esposa Jeamileth Calderon Robleto, quien se dedica a los queaceres del hogar, E. es un pequeño Productor, desde muy pequeño se dedica a explotar su parcela con actividades agricola y Ganadera, ya que su propiedad presenta buenas condiciones tecnica, finca diversificada, localizada en la comunidad de Santa fé en el municicipio de Nueva Guinea,  obtiene ingreso de venta de producto de la finca,  también tiene su inventario ganadero.  

Por lo tanto requiere financiamiento para establecimiento de pasto mejorado,  con el objetivo de aumentar su inventario ganadero y mejorar su dieta del hato, su crédito anterio lo pago en tiempo y forma, este cliente es trabajador responsable honesto, en la comunidad,  hay buenas referencia de él, esta agradecido con la institución por el servicio prestado ya que ha mejorado su calidad de vida del núcleo familiar, por ser un crédito con un interes bajo.  

Solicita apoyo a Kiva y desde ya agradece mucho, pues esto le permitirá cumplir su sueño de poder garantizar el pan de cada dia a su familia y fortalecer la unidad de produccion.
texts.en:
Young E., age 26, lives with his wife Jeamileth Calderon Robleto, who does the housework. E. is a small-scale producer. He has worked his land from a very young age, raising livestock and planting crops. His land is good and his farm is diversified. It is located in the Santa Fe community, in the Nueva Guinea municipality. He makes an income from the sales of products from his farm. He also has an inventory of livestock.

He needs a loan to establish a better pasture, with the objective of increasing his livestock inventory and improving the herd's diet. He paid his previous loan on time and properly. This client is hard-working, responsible and honest. The community provided good references for him. He is grateful to the institution for the service offered, since it has improved the quality of life of his family because it was a loan with low interest.

He is requesting a loan from Kiva and is very grateful because it will allow him to achieve his dream of being able to guarantee his family's daily bread and strengthen his production.

loans.use: establishment of a pasture

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
La Sera Angela, de 41 años de edad, comparte estos momentos de su vida con su esposo Jose Dominto Fernandez, quien le ayuda en las actividades Ganaderas y en los cultivos de la Finca que tienen ubicada en la Comarca Esperancita # 1; Doña Angela proviene de una familia humilde, es una exelente persona, trabajadora, dedicada, y sobre todo muy responsable,  obtiene sus ingresos  de la comercialización de ganado y de cultivos de raices y tuberculos, 

Solicita su 1er crédito con el apoyo de Kiva, para compra de ternero de desarrollo, lo cual piensa incrementar su hato ganadero asi de esta manera obtener mayor ingresos y por ende mayor estabilidad económica.  

Su mayor sueño es aumentar su inventario y brindar mayor condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Angela is 41 years old and lives with her husband Jose Dominto Fernandez who helps her in her business raising livestock and growing crops on the farm that they own in Esperancita #1 region.  Angela is from a humble family.  She is an excellent person, hard-working, dedicated and very responsible.  She  makes her income selling livestock, root vegetables and tubers.

Angela is requesting her first Kiva loan to buy calves to raise.  She plans, in this way, to increase her herd so that she can obtain more profits and, thereby, more financial stability.  Angela's biggest dream is to increase her inventory and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy calves to raise

loans.name: Koem's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Koem S. is a widow with three children, one of whom is a farming laborer while the others are studying in the local public school. She lives in Tadak Pong village in Takeo province.

Sixteen people who make up a village bank loan chose Koem to be their bank president. The loan members will use their portions of the loan in varied ways to improve their families’ living situations.

Koem is a sugar and fruit vender as well as a farmer who owns a very small piece of land upon which she grows rice to sell to support her family. Since her business is going well, she wants to expand. To do so, Koem is seeking a loan to buy more sugar and additionally, to rebuild her house.

loans.use: To buy more sugar and rebuild her house

loans.name: Ingrid Sarai

texts.es:
