Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá para mejorar su triciclo y adquirir más mercadería.
texts.en:
Obdulia, 40, lives with her husband and four children in her own house.  For the last three years she has been selling candy and snacks at the entrance of an elementary school near her house, especially during recess and when school lets out.  During school vacation periods she takes advantage of vacation classes carried out at various local schools in order to have more sales.  She divides her time well between her household chores and tending to her business every day for which she relies on a small cart to transport the candy from home to school.  During her time at work she has noticed the advantages her business has so she has decided to improve her establishment with a larger quantity of snacks.

This is her 2nd loan with MFP.  She is happy to know that she has financial help.  Besides, she enjoys being part of her communal bank because all the members are people she knows who are responsible and very mutually supportive.

She thanks the people who will fund the loan she is requesting that will be very useful for her business’ progress.  She will use the requested loan to improve her tricycle and to acquire more merchandise.

loans.use: To improve her tricycle and stock up on snacks.

loans.name: Aligda Del Carmen

texts.es:
Aligda de 28 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos, ella es soltera, vive con sus padres. El negocio se fundó por iniciativa propia hace 5 años, atendiendo todos los días a su granja desde las 5:00am hasta el atardecer, ya que este oficio es de todo el día, por el momento todo marcha bien en el negocio y ha decidido comprar más cerdos para la crianza, por lo que solicita un préstamo para adquirir tres cerdos aumentando su granja y con la oportunidad de recibir mejores ganancias en un futuro.
Con este préstamo crecerá su negocio y estará más motivada para cuidar y alimentar los cerdos, trabajando arduamente para lograr sus objetivos y metas que son establecerse con una granja grande y rentable de cerdos, ayudando a sus padres cubriendo gastos que demanda el hogar.
texts.en:
Álgida, 28, lives in El Transito, Morazán department.  She is a pig merchant. She is single and lives with her parents.  She started the business on her own initiative five years ago.  She tends to her farm every day from 5am until nightfall since this is an all-day occupation.  For the time being, everything is going well in the business and she has decided to buy more pigs to raise so needs a loan in order to buy three pigs to increase her farm’s size thus providing the possibility of higher profits in the future.

This loan will make her business grow and she’ll be more motivated to care for and feed the pigs working hard to reach her goals and objectives which are to establish a large, profitable pig farm to help her parents meet household expenses.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Roman

texts.en:
Roman is married with two sons. He lives in Belaya Tserkov. Roman manufactures custom-made cabinet furniture and re-sells factory-manufactured furniture pieces. He has an individual approach to every customer; every furniture item is of high quality and manufactured on time. Roman has recently opened a new vending location in the same area of his hometown. He has been in the trade for five years. Currently, his net profit amounts to 4,000 Grivnyas a month.     

Roman is seeking a loan of 5,000 Grivnyas to prepare all the paperwork for a wholesale furniture delivery contract with a furniture supermarket called MEBITAR. He is hoping to increase his scale of manufactured furniture items and thus increase his sales and income as a result. Roman is an ambitious businessman. He is ready to work hard and make his enterprise grow and succeed in the future.

loans.use: To prepare paperwork for wholesale supply contract

loans.name: Azra's Group

texts.en:
Azra got married many years ago to G. R.. She doesn’t have any children and lives with her husband in a 4-room brick house in a city called Mian Channu. Mian Channu is a small city in Pakistan, known for its agriculture industry. She lives there in the area of Kothi Nand Singh. She is a housewife, stays at home and does her household work. 

Her husband has a business selling and repairing speakers (a part of a sound system). He sells local as well as company-made speakers. He has been doing this business for over 8 years and it is working well for him. The people of Pakistan are fond of listening music so they approach him to buy speakers from him.     

Azra has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy speakers from well-known companies like Sony and Pioneer to put in his shop for resale.  Azra is hopeful that an investment will bring good profit to her husband and help her save money for her and her husband’s older age. 

She is a new loan user of Asasah and this is her 1st loan application.

loans.use: To buy speakers (a part of sound system) for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a corn mill.

loans.name: Fuente De Paz 9 Group

texts.en:
Jesemena is a coordinator for the group Fuente de Paz 9 in El Seybo. She has five children and her husband. Jesemena operates a bakery, where she sells baked food, especially bread; most of her customers are from nearby areas. She is applying for her 8th loan from Esperanza. With her new loan she wants to increase her business even more, by buying goods like flour, oil, gas and charcoal for the oven, and other items.

Jesemena hopes that she will one day be able to buy a nice house to live in. She is also very preoccupied about the future of her children; one of her biggest challenges in life is give them what they need to become professionals, educated citizens. She will use her business profits to save and invest in her business, because she is dreaming of changing her family's life in the short term, God willing!

loans.use: to buy goods for bakery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay down payment on her house.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es: Sara, de 51 años, vive en su casa que es propia, junto a su esposo y dos de los cuatro hijos que tiene en total, pues los mayores son independientes. Desde hace muchos años esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la fabricación de  manualidades en su vivienda, ahí confecciona muñecos que sirven como adornos para los ambientes de la casa y también adornos navideños; paralelamente pinta cuadros y elabora recordatorios para bautizos, promociones entre otros. Pues mediante esta actividad se genera sus propios ingresos con los que ayuda a  los gastos en su hogar. Desde entonces es muy conocida en su barrio, ya que realiza trabajos de buen acabado y a precios muy asequibles, es por esta razón  que sus vecinos no dudan de recomendarles, porque saben de su responsabilidad. Ella  siempre recepciona sonriente  los trabajos que tiene por hacer, ya que a veces  cuenta con el apoyo de otra persona, de ese modo es muy oportuna con su trabajo. En la actualidad  piensa estudiar manualidades en decoraciones de cintas, de esta manera espera ampliar los servicios que brinda. Es el 11avo crédito con MFP, y es un asocia muy puntual  con sus cuotas, además es muy  responsable con las obligaciones de su banco comunal. El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en la  compra de cintas,  telas, esponjas que son materiales que necesitan para  sus respectivos rellenos y accesorios para continuar realizando sus trabajos de manualidades, de esta manera espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Sara, 51, lives in her own house with her husband and two of their four children since the oldest two are independent adults.  For several years now this enterprising woman has been making crafts at home.  She makes figurines used to decorate homes and also Christmas decorations.  She also makes paintings and keepsakes for baptisms, graduations, etc.  Through this activity she earns her own income that helps her meet household expenses.

She is very well known in her neighborhood because she makes items that are well done at accessible prices so her neighbors always recommend her knowing of her responsibility.

She always welcomes the jobs she has to do with a smile.  Sometimes she has a helper so she is always punctual with her work.  She currently wants to take a ribbon decorating crafts course to expand the services she offers.

This is her 11th loan with MFP.  She is very punctual with her payments as well as very responsible with her communal bank commitments. 

She will use the requested loan to buy ribbons, fabrics and foam which are the supplies needed for her various fillings and accessories to continue making her crafts and improving profits.

loans.use: To buy ribbon, fabric, foam and other crafts-making accessories.

loans.name: Parsaan's Group

texts.en:
Parsaan comes from Mian Chanu, a small city in Punjab, Pakistan, known for its agriculture industry. She has been living there with her family in a 3-room brick house in the area of Kothi Nand Singh for over 12 years. She is a housewife, stays at home and takes care of her household responsibilities. She is the mother of an only son who is illiterate; he couldn’t get an education due to the poor financial condition of the family.

 Her husband's name is G. R. and he has a business selling & repairing car batteries. He owns a shop in the market through which he sells different brands of batteries to his customers and earns income for the family. His son also helps him in his business. 

Parsaan has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy car batteries to put in his shop for sale. He will also buy some repair tools to provide car battery repair services to his clients. He has been doing this business for the past 8 years, and Parsaan is hopeful that her husband’s business will be improved further after investing loan money into it. 

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 5th loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy car batteries and repair tools

loans.name: Luis Roberto

texts.es:
A sus 45 años Luis Roberto B. B., por la falta de oportunidades para conseguir empleo y después de haber laborado en algunas ventas ambulantes y gracias a la oportunidad brindada por una amiga, inició con su propio negocio, un carro de comidas rápidas que es su única fuente de sustento. 

Luis Roberto sueña con tener otros puntos de venta con el fin de ampliar su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos. Por ahora, este emprendedor necesita de un préstamo para comprar silletería ya que la que tiene actualmente está en malas condiciones, así le podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes, además desea comprar mayor cantidad de insumos para tener mayor capacidad de respuesta para los pedidos que le realizan.
texts.en:
At the age of 45 facing the lack of employment opportunities after having worked in ambulatory sales, Luis Roberto B. B. started his own business with help from a friend.  He set up a fast food cart which is his only source of income.

Luis Roberto dreams with having other sales points in order to expand his business and improve his income.  For now, this entrepreneur needs a loan 
to buy tables and chairs because what he has now is in bad condition and he could then offer better customer service.  Besides, he’d like to buy larger amounts of ingredients so that he can meet greater demand of orders placed.

loans.use: To buy tables, chairs and ingredients.

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es: Maria Gabriela tiene 23 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio, ya que desde muy joven aprendio este medio de vida y con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado sobrevivir con su hijo menor de edad a su cargo, inicio este negocio por su propia cuenta por lo que no tenía un trabajo estable y así proporcionar ingresos fijos. Ella solicita este financiamiento para la compra de calzado, cosméticos, ropa interior y sabanas. Sueña con poder formar a su hijo par que sea una persona de bien.
texts.en:
Maria Gabriela is 23 years old.  She sells general merchandise.  She’s had this business for over 10 years.  Through much effort she has managed to survive with a minor son in her care.  She started this business on her own initiative because she did not have stable employment and needed to earn steady income.

She is asking for this loan to buy footwear, cosmetics, underwear and sheets.  She dreams with raising her son to be an upstanding citizen.

loans.use: To buy footwear, cosmetics, underwear and sheets.

loans.name: Gladis Aidee

texts.es:
Doña Gladis, tiene 53 años de edad, reside en Concepción Batres donde vive sola, ya que sus hijos han formado sus propios hogares, ella vende productos lácteos este negocio nació por iniciativa propia, por la necesidad y para mantenerse ocupada, este negocio no tiene horario fijo por que los clientes en toda hora llegan a buscar estos productos.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para compra de leche para preparar la venta, esto contribuirá para que continúe en el negocio y ofrezca a los clientes productos frescos y de calidad.
Su visión de comerciante es mantenerse siempre activa en el negocio produciendo cada vez más y recibir ingresos para ir poco a poco mejorando su condición económica.
texts.en:
Gladis, 53, lives alone in Concepción Batres because her children have all formed their own households.  She sells dairy products, a business she started on her own initiative because she needed to stay occupied.  The business does not have a fixed schedule because customers come by at all hours seeking these products.

She is currently asking for a loan to buy milk to sell.  This will contribute to her staying in business offering customers fresh, quality products.

Her vision as a merchant is to always stay active in business producing more each time earning income to gradually improve her economic condition.

loans.use: To buy milk.

loans.name: Hernando De Jesús

texts.es:
Desde las 4:00 a.m. Hernando de Jesús M. E. inicia su jornada laboral, pues su negocio de venta de chocolos desgranados y sin desgranados en la Minorista de Medellín exige estar en pie desde tempranas horas de la mañana. Desde hace 23 años ha trabajado en este sector, aunque fue después cuando descubrió que podía trabajar como independiente para solventar los costos del hogar. 

A sus 67 años, Hernando espera seguir trabajando y adquirir cada vez más ingresos gracias a su ventas. Actualmente requiere de un préstamo para comprar los insumos que le permitirán obtener mayores ventas.
texts.en:
From 4 AM, Hernando de Jesús M. E. starts his workday.  His business is the sale of corn, shucked and in the husk, in the market of Medellín, which requires him to stand from the early hours of the morning.  For 23 years he has worked at this business, although it was in later years that he could work independently to manage his household expenses.   
At 67 years of age, Hernando hopes to continue working and earn more income each day thanks to his sales. At the present time he needs a loan to buy the supplies which will allow him to increase his sales.

loans.use: To buy supplies

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es: La Señora Maria Gabriela tiene 33 años. Tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo viven junto a ella en el barrio de fundeci, ella brinda los productos de venta de ropa tiene una excelente atención con sus clientes, razón por la cual ella tiene en el negocio más de 8 años y poco a poco a construido su casita y educado a sus hijos. Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería y de este modo abastecer su negocio. Maria valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Señora Maria Gabriela is 33 years of age.  She has 2 young children in her care who live with her in the neighborhood of Funeci.  She offers clothing for sale and has an excellent reputation with her clients.  For this reason she has had the business more than 8 years.  Little by little she has built her small house and educated her children.  She requests a loan to buy merchandise and in this way supply her business.  Maria values and is infinitely thankful for the credit offered which permits her to grow her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy clothing for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy goods.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita tiene 61 años, tiene 2 hijas adoptivas, que la adoran mucho, y viven en su casa  que es propia. Por muchos años atrás vende productos de belleza, ofreciendo de casa en casa; después  apoyaba a sus hijas con su negocio, atendiendo a los clientes. Con el tiempo sus hijas la motivaron para que tenga su propio negocio, desde entonces, tiene una vitrina donde exhibe sus cosméticos en una tienda que alquiló, ahora ya no tiene necesidad de caminar largos trayectos para vender sus productos. Le gusta el negocio que realiza, porque se siente muy entretenida realizando esta labor, aparte de eso capta buenas utilidades. Para intensificar su negocio, está pensado diversificar con más productos y  también implementar con más joyas de catálogos  y de fantasía finas. Es el 11avo crédito con MFP, y como es socia antigua es muy responsable en la pago de sus cuotas, ya valora la utilidad del  dinero  para su progreso. De obtener el crédito solicitado, lo invertirá en el incremento de productos de belleza para continuar trabajando con su negocio.
texts.en: Felicita is 61 years of age.  She has 2 adopted daughters, whom she adores very much.  She lives in her own home.  For many years she sold beauty products, offering them house to house.  Later she supported her two daughters with her business, tending to her clients.  With time her daughters motivated her to have her own store.  Since then, she has had a case where she shows her cosmetics in a store that she rents.  Now she doesn't need to walk such long distances to sell her products.  She enjoys running her business, because she feels entertained by her work, aside from the fact that it gives keeps her well occupied.  To grow her business, she is thinking of diversifying her products and adding more jewelry and fine fantasy items from catalogs.  This is her 11th loan with MFP, and, since she is an old associate, she is very responsible in making her payments.  She values the use of money to get ahead.  On obtaining the loan requested, she will invest in the purchase of beauty products to continue working with her business.

loans.use: To grow her inventory of beauty products

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 58 años,  es separada de su esposo y vive con sus dos hijos que estudian, en su casa que es propia. Desde hace 11 años, está trabajadora mujer se dedica a la venta de comida rápida en la puerta de su casa, hasta altas horas de la noche. Es por ello, que todos los días muy temprano por la mañana, realiza sus compras, adquiriendo productos no perecibles como carne de aves, que es el alimento que más acogida tiene. Es un negocio muy exitoso, ya que su buen carácter y su buena atención le han permitido captar muchos clientes de su barrio, y es por eso,  que se siente muy feliz. Sin embargo sufre mucho en temporada de inviernos ya que tiene muchas dolencias en los huesos causada por el frío. Ana está pensando en el futuro vivir del alquiler de su cuarto, y para ello espera terminar de construir su casa. Es el 11avo crédito con MFP, y  como socia antigua de su banco comunal se siente muy agradecida por todo el apoyo que recibe en los reiterados créditos, por ello se compromete pagar sus cuotas de acuerdo lo establecido en su cronograma. De obtener el crédito solicitado, comprará  toldo de su salchipapera para ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en: Ana is 58 years old, separated from her husband and lives in her own home with her two children, who are in school. For the past 11 years this hard-working woman has made a living selling fast food at her home's front door until the late hours of the evening. She gets up very early to make her purchases, acquiring products like poultry, which is her most popular item. It is a very successful business since her good personality and her good customer service brings in a lot of people from her neighborhood, and for this reason she is very happy. However, she suffers a lot during the winter season because she gets many body pains caused by the cold. Ana is planning in the future to live off of renting out one of her rooms, and for that she hopes to finish construction on her home. This is her 11th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and as a longtime member of her community bank she feels very grateful for all the support she has received with her past loans. She promises to make her payments over the established period. With the loan she is requesting, she plans to purchase an awning to provide her customers with more comfort.

loans.use: Purchase an awning to provide her customers with more comfort.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 64 años, vive en su casa que es propia,  al lado de su esposo y sus dos hijas adultas, quienes ya tienen familia. Desde hace 5 años, está laboriosa madre de familia se dedica a  la venta de productos de belleza a sus familiares y vecinas de su barrio. Por esta razón,  que todas las tardes a partir  de las tres de la tarde, se dedica a recorrer las calles de su barrio, para ofrecer sus productos de belleza y mostrar sus catálogos. Sólo trabajando de esta manera es que alcanza la meta de sus pedidos para la campaña del mes,  y es una de las primeras en vender más. Le gusta el negocio que realiza por que se entretiene  mucho conversando con cada uno de sus clientes, además le permite captar buena utilidades. Por ello se siente muy feliz, pero a veces se fastidia por lo que le demoran en pagar los créditos que dio, ya que eso le perjudica, y siendo así a veces que no puede  adquirir más productos. Es el 11avo crédito con MFP, y sabe que este aporte le será de mucha utilidad para continuar realizando su negocio. Por ello, paga sus cuotas oportunamente  para acceder a otras ayudas en el futuro. De obtener el crédito solicitado, lo piensa invertir en la compra de más productos de belleza, para abastecer los pedidos pendientes que tiene.
texts.en: Ana is 64 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their two adult children, who also have families. For the past five years this hard-working mother has made a living selling beauty products to relatives and neighbors. Every afternoon after 3 she travels the streets of her neighborhood, offering her products and showing her catalogs. Only working in this way can she reach the goal of orders for the month, and she is one of the first to exceed it. She enjoys her work because she is entertained by conversing with every one of her customers, and it allows her to bring in good profits. She feels very happy, but she gets bothered sometimes because her loans get held up so sometimes she can't acquire more products. This is her 11th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she knows that this support will be very helpful in continuing her business. She plans to make her payments on time in order to have access to more aid in the future. With the loan she is requesting, she plans to invest in the purchase of more beauty products to supply the order backlog that she has.

loans.use: Stock up on beauty products

loans.name: Las Trabajadoras 10 De Octubre Group

texts.es:
LAS TRABAJADORA 10 DE OCTUBRE

Silvia pertenece al grupo de Alcancía Comunal “LAS TRABAJADORAS 10 DE OCTUBRE” reciente mente lleva el cargo de presidenta del grupo el grupo esta conformado por 7 personas que decidieron ponerle ese nombre a su grupo por que las 7 personas son del la misma zona y tanbien son trabajadoras.
Silvia tiene 43 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 1 hijo que es mayor de edad (independientes) Silvia tiene ya 3 años trabajada repartiendo desayunos a los trabajadores de su zona y asta la fecha a logrado comprarse un terreno y comprado artículos para su vivienda y si tuviera un capital de trabajo lo invertiría en poner un restaurante y con la ayuda de Edaprospo-Prosperidad esperemos que lo logre.
texts.en:
Silvia belongs to the 'Las Trabajadoras 10 de Octubre' community bank.  She has recently taken on the role of group president.  This group has 7 members who gave the group its name because they all live in the same area and are workers (trabajadoras).

Silvia is 43 years old.  She is a single mother and has one grown-up child who lives independently.  Silvia has been working for 3 years delivering breakfasts to workers in her area and she has so far managed to buy a plot of land and items for her home.  If she had working capital, she would invest it in setting up a restaurant.  With the help of Edaprospo-Prosperidad we hope that she will achieve this.

loans.use: Her home

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
La señora Mariela S. E. tiene 21 años de edad y vive en una casa de propiedad de sus padres en la ciudad de Tarija. Mariela es madre soltera de 2 hijos, por circunstancias de la vida se quedo sola ahora ella tiene que trabajar para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos.  Mariela se dedica desde hace mas de 3 años a la elaboración de salteñas la cual vende en el mercado campesino, teniendo muy buena clientela Mariela quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante con sus hijos , pero ella nos cuenta que tiene la oportunidad de comprar mercadería a un precio módico. Es por eso que el crédito será destinado para la compra del material necesario para realizar su actividad para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.        
                                                                                                                                                                                                
Mariela nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite sera para mejorar las condiciones de la casa donde vive.
texts.en:
Mariela S. E. is 21 years old and lives in a home belonging to her parents in the city of Tarija.  Mariela is the single mother of two children.  Her life’s circumstances have caused her to be alone and she has to work in order to get ahead with her children.

For the past three years, Mariela has been making and selling salteñas (a type of baked meat pie) in the country market.  Having steady customers, Mariela would like to increase her income in order to get ahead with her children.

She tells us that she has the opportunity to buy merchandise at a modest price, so she is asking for this loan.  She will use the money to buy the necessary material and be able to increase her income.

She also tells us that she wants to improve her living conditions and so the next loan she will request will be to make improvements to the home where she lives.

loans.use: Supplies and ingredients

loans.name: Emigdio

texts.es:
El señor Emigdio Velásquez Orellana ha nacido el 5 de Agosto de 1959, en la localidad de Tiraque de la Provincia de Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba. 

La actividad que se dedica el señor Emigdio es la agricultura que siembra tubérculos, en la actividad trabajan toda la familia en algunos casos con ayuda de los vecinos según  sus usos y costumbres, las tierras que siembra se encuentran  en la parte alta de Tiraque las siembras que realizan son estacionales ósea que cosechan una vez al año.

La vivienda del señor es la construcción de puro barro con techo de teja, que está ubicado en la calle palmar salida a Millu Mayu. Vive con su familia que tiene dos hijos de vive con ellos y está casada con Basilia Pizo de Velásquez

El Crédito que ha solicitado es para comprar insumos agrícolas Obono de gallinaza y semilla de para ya para sembrar este año.
texts.en:
Mr. Emigdio Velásquez Orellana was born on the 5th of August 1959 in the locality of Tiraque in the province of Tiraque in the Cochabama department.

Mr. Emigdio works in agriculture planting tubers. His entire family works in this activity and in some cases has help from neighbours according to his habits and customs. The fields that he plants are located in the high part of Tiraque. The planting he does is seasonal, which is to say they harvest once a year.

Mr. Emigdio's home is constructed from pure mud and a tile roof. It is located on Palmar street exiting to Millu Maya. He lives with his family and has two children who live with them. He is married to Basilia Pizo de Velásquez.
  
The loan he has requested is to buy agricultural fertilizers, chicken manure, and seeds to plant this year.

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizer for agricultural activity

loans.name: Shabana's Group

texts.en:
Shabana lives in Lahore, which is the second largest city of Pakistan and famous for its history and culture. She lives there with her family in the area of Mughalpura in a 3-roomed house. 

A talented lady, Shabana operates an embroidery business at her home. She makes embroidered dresses for her neighboring clients and earns well after completing them. She is the mother of 2 sons and 3 daughters. All of them study, except the youngest one who is only 2 years old.  
Her husband’s name is M. and he is a painter by profession. He paints walls, doors and windows on contract and generates income for the family. 

Shabana has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to improve her embroidery business. With the loan, she will purchase embroidery material such as beads, colored thread and clothes in bulk to offer more embroidered variety to her customers and to make more income. She has been operating this business for over 9 years and she is hopeful that an investment will bring more profits for her. She is a new loan applicant of Asasah. 

Note: “In the photo, the lady with a raising hand is Shabana”.

loans.use: To buy embroidery supplies for embroidery business.

loans.name: Henry Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Henry Jesus H. E. tiene 29 años de edad y vive en la casa de sus padres  en el barrio Tabladita  de la ciudad de Tarija. Henry no es casado y no tiene hijos. El señor Henry se dedica desde hace mas de 6 años a la producción de plantas ornamentales las cuales las vende en las diferentes ferias y exposiciones de plantas que realiza la alcaldía. Henry quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante, pero el nos cuenta que tiene la necesidad de ampliar su vivero porque el que tiene ya esta pequeño. Es por eso que el crédito será destinado para la ampliación de su vivero, para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.
                                                                                                                  Henry nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite será para seguir ampliando su vivero.
texts.en:
Señor Henry Jesus H. E. is 29 years old and lives in his parent's house in the Tabladita neighborhood in the city of Tarija.  Henry is not married and doesn't have any children. 

For more than 6 years now, Señor Henry has been growing ornamental plants that he sells in the various markets and plant shows in his municipality.  He wants to increase his income so that he can get ahead, but he tells us that he needs to expand his nursery because it is small.  It is for this reason that he is requesting a loan.  Henry tells us that he wants to improve his living conditions and that the next loan he requests will be used to expand his nursery even more.

loans.use: To expand his ornamental plants nursery

loans.name: Mariana

texts.en:
Mariana is one of our businesswomen who run her own business. Maraina runs a Colmado, a shop, where she sells such commodities as colored candles, bread, chips, sweets, cherries, gum, spices, matches, chocolate cake by the slice, and other goods like rice, beans, oil, sugar flour, etc. She will invest in those goods to improve her inventory.

Mariana got her first loan to expand her business. Now, after 4 years as an Esperanza client, she is receiving her 7th loan, after having successfully repaid her previous loans and grown her business. 

Mariana is the mother of three children, all of whom share her home with her and their father. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti). The rural area surrounding El Seybo, is an agricultural area. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: To buy beans, oil, rice, sugar  and other products for her shop.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es: Gilberto tiene 51 años, su actividad es la compra y venta de cerdos. Anteriormente vendía gallinas, pero con el paso del tiempo es que ha logrado adquirir experiencia pero decidió iniciar con el negocio de compra y venta de   cerdos, tiene ciertas personas que llegan a buscarlos para que Gilberto compre los cerdos. Este crédito es para la compra de cerdos y alimentos para ellos.  Desea mejorar sus ingresos para mantener a su familia.
texts.en: Gilberto is 51 years old and he buys and sells hogs.  He used to sell chickens, but over time he gained more experience and decided to begin buying and selling hogs.  People seek him out to sell hogs to him.  He will use the money from this loan to buy hogs and feed.  He wants to increase his income so that he can support his family.

loans.use: Hogs and feed

loans.name: Sarwar's Group

texts.en:
Sarwar is 39 years old, married to M. R., and has 5 children. Her eldest son is a rickshaw driver, while 3 of the remaining four are getting their education. Her husband is a fruit seller. He sells different seasonal fruits from his shop, which is located in the market. He is known for his good quality products that he sells to his customers. He has been operating this business for over 12 years. 

Sarwar is a hardworking lady, runs a paper envelope-selling business. She does this work to support her family financially. She takes orders from stationary shops and earns well by completing them. She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will purchase more seasonal fruits to offer for sale at his shop. Sarwar is hopeful that, through this investment, her husband’s business will grow further and increase his monthly income. 

She is a new loan user of Asasah and this is her first loan application. She hopes that it will be a good experience for her. She in the city called Lahore, the second largest city in Pakistan and famous for its food and culture. 

Note: “In the photo, the lady with a raising hand is Sarwar”.

loans.use: To buy seasonal fruits for fruit-selling business.

loans.name: Arlen Verónica

texts.es:
Doña Arlen Verónica S. trabaja como auxiliar  de oficina en una Universidad, desde hace 5 años.

Ella es casada con 1 persona que depende de ella, habita en la ciudad de Managua en el barrio Riguero ya tiene 3 años de vivir en este lugar.

Ella está solicitando este crédito para construir su vivienda agradece a CEPRODEL por brindarle este crédito, ya que es una forma de poder construir su casa y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Arlen Verónica S. lives has been living in the Riguero neighborhood of Managua for three years and has been working as an office assistant at a university for five years.  She is married and has one dependent.

She is asking for this credit so she can build her house.  She is grateful to CEPRODEL for granting her this loan, which will help her build her home and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: Build a house

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria Elena se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Inicio con fondos propios a pesar que no tenía mucho capital para aumentar su inventario pero con el paso del tiempo es que ha podido sacar adelante su medio de vida. Hace más de 15 años que tiene este medio de vida, por lo que ha sido importante para mantener 2 hijos a su cargo. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de ropa, calzado, cosméticos, sabanas y toallas. Sueña con aumentar su negocio y mejorar cada día más el servicio de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maria Elena sells general merchandise.  She began by investing her own money, even though she didn't have much to start with, but over time she's managed to increase her inventory and improve her livelihood.  She's been doing this for more than 15 years, and it's been important in her support of her two children.

She will use the money from this loan to invest in clothing, shoes, cosmetics, sheets, and towels.  She hopes to be able to grow her business and improve her customer service daily.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Zubaida's Group

texts.en:
Zubaida lives in the historic city of Lahore, Pakistan. It is known for its culture and food. Zubaida has been living there, in the area of Mughalpura, with her family for the last 23 years. She is a 45 year old housewife who spends most of her time at home doing her household responsibilities. Besides her household works, she also does embroidery work, part-time. She is very good at her work and receives a good number of orders every month. She learned this art from her mother before her marriage and she is now taking advantage of her skill in the shape of money. She receives orders from her neighboring customers and earns well by completing the orders on time. Her income allows her to pay off the utility bills of her house.  

Zubaida is married to G. A. who is a tailor by profession. He specifically sews men’s clothes and runs a shop in the market. Zubaida has given birth to 4 sons and 2 daughters. Her three elder sons are involved in different works. They couldn’t complete their education and had to start work at a young age to financially support the family. Two of her 3 younger children are enrolled in school and are getting their education. 

Zubaida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the improvement of her husband’s tailoring business. He will invest the loan in purchasing a sewing machine and he will hire a worker who will help him complete the orders on time to make extra income. Zubaida is hopeful that the investment will take her husband’s business to a more profitable position. 

Note: “In the photo, the lady with a raised hand is Zubaida”.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for tailoring business.

loans.name: Norma De La Concepción

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Managua habita Doña Norma H. quien trabaja en ventas de una importadora de productos farmacéuticos, desde hace 12 años.
Ella es casada con 2 hijos que dependen de ella, estos están en edad escolar.
Actualmente ella está necesitada de comprar materiales de construcción para poder levantar su casa que con mucho esfuerzo la ha ido mejorando y expresa que está agradecida por que CEPRODEL ha ayudado a cumplir con sus sueños mediante el otorgamiento de 8 créditos los que ha utilizado en su mayoría para la mejora de su casa y así poder tener una casa digna para ella y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Norma H. lives in the city of Managua and has been working in the pharmaceutical import business for 12 years.  She is married and has two school-aged children to support.

At the moment she needs to buy building materials in order to fix up her house, which with great effort she has managed to improve little by little.  She is grateful to CEPRODEL, who has helped her fulfill her dreams with the help of eight previous loans which she has used to improve her home and make it dignified for her and for her children.

loans.use: Home improvement

loans.name: Armando Ruben

texts.es:
El señor  Armando A. L. , se encuentra casado tiene 3 hijos, y contoda su familia vive por la zona de Aeropuerto de Cochabamba, se dedica a la costura de forros para armar colchones, ellos costuran todolo que sea con tela y los rellenos con resorte lo realizan en una empresa particular, pero el Sr Armando y su familia en su casa solo hacen las uniones el, relleno con esponja, esta actividad es muy trabajosa pues el manipuleo porque las piezas son muy grandes, y ocupan mucho espacio en su casa.

Pero les es rentable este trabajo por esta razon se dedican con mucho en entusiasmo a la confeccion, pero para ser mas eficientes en su trabajo necesitan comprar una maquina de costura mas, pues solo cuentan con una que hace costuras rectas y otra que hace los bordes.

El Sr. Armando se apersono a solictar un credito que lo usara para invertir en una maquina de costura la que les sera de mucha ayuda para mejora su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Armando A. L. is married and has three children.  He and his family live in the Cochabamba Airport zone.  [Armando] makes mattress covers that are stuffed to make full mattresses.  He does all of the sewing and the springs and stuffing is installed in a private factory, but he and his family make the foam stuffing in their home.  This is hard work, the pieces are large, and take up a lot of room in his home.

But it is profitable, so they dedicate themselves to this with great enthusiasm.  They need to buy another sewing machine in order to be more efficient because at the moment they have one that does the straight stitching and another that does the embroidery.

Armando has seen fit to request a loan so that he can invest in the sewing machine, which will help them improve their quality of life.

loans.use: Sewing machine

loans.name: Shahnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shahnaz lives in the historic city of Lahore, Pakistan.  Lahore is the second largest city of Pakistan and known for its history and culture. 
Shahnaz lives there with her family in the area of Mughalpura, in a 2-room brick house.  She is 34 years old and married with 5 children. Three of the children are studying, while the remaining two are very young and have not started to attend school. 

Her husband runs a barber shop in the market, where he offers hair-cutting and hair-dressing services to his clients. He specifically deals with male clients. He has been in this business for over 9 years and is well known in his area for his quality work and good behavior with his customers. 

Shahnaz is a hardworking lady and operates a business selling clothes.  She buys famous-named clothes, such as "Ichra" and "Shahalmi", from markets in Lahore, and sells to her neighbors in order to support her husband financially.  She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for her husband’s business. With the loan he will purchase scissors, hair gels and shampoos, etc., in bulk, and expand his business.  Shahnaz is hopeful that this investment will prove to be a profitable one for her husband and will help him to improve his business condition. 

She is a new loan applicant of Asasah.   Note: “In the photo, the lady with a raised hand is Shahnaz”.

loans.use: To buy scissors, hair gels & shampoos for barber shop

loans.name: Omar René

texts.es: El Señor Omar se dedica a la venta de mochilas, maletas y también juguetes, el desde muy temprana edad realiza esta actividad por que de esta forma él genera ingresos para la manutención de su Mama y sus hermanos, el es huérfano de padre desde hace varios años.  Lamentablemente en la zona que estaba su domicilio hubo una falla geológica y tuvieron que desalojar su vivienda por que así lo dispuso la Alcaldía pero entonces adquirieron una casa cerca de su anterior vivienda donde no había ningún problema con el suelo y esto fue para ellos una situación muy difícil, ya que dejar su casa en estas condiciones, pero lo superaron y ahora se encuentran muy bien, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de mochilas por cantidad ya que están empezando la época de clases y tendrá mucha venta, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en:
Omar sells book bags, suitcases, and toys.  He began doing this at an early age because it allowed him to earn an income to help support his mother and brothers.  He's been without a father for several years.

Unfortunately, there was a geologic fault in the zone where his home was located, and they had to raise the house by order of the town council.  They later acquired a house close to their old one, where there were no problems with the ground.  This was a difficult situation for them, having to leave their home under these circumstances, but they managed to get through it and are doing well now.

They will use the money from this loan to buy book bags in quantity, now that classes are starting and he will have more sales.  He is grateful to the institution for its support.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase basic grains and other products for his general store.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Doña Rosa, vive en el transito con su familia: su esposo y una hija D. 26 años que actualmente está estudiando, doña Rosa con 62 años D. edad se dedica a vender pupusas desD. hace 5 años, este negocio lo inicio con ahorros que tenia y lo atienD. D. 6:00am a 12:00pm, la ubicación es parte muy importante para que hasta hoy se mantenga activo el negocio pues frente a su vivienda está la unidad D. salud, este lugar es muy concurrido por las mañanas dándole a doña Rosa la seguridad para ofrecer las pupusas sin temor a perder la venta. 
Por el momento está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mobiliario (mesas, sillas) también comprara materiales D. cocina para preparar la venta, este préstamo le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y a atender mejor a los clientes.
Su proyección es ampliar la pupuseria, aumentar la clientela y mejorar las condiciones D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in El Transito with her family: her husband and her daughter who is 26 years old and is currently studying. Rosa is 62 years old and has been selling pupusas for five years. She started this business with savings that she had. She works from 6:00 am until 12:00 pm. The location is a very important part of the reason that her business is so active since the health department is in front of her home. This location is very busy in the mornings which gives Rosa the security to offer her pupusas without fearing a loss of sales. 

She is currently asking for a loan to buy chairs and tables and to also buy materials for the kitchen to prepare her pupusas. This loan will help strengthen her business and allow her to better cater to her customers. 

Her goals are to expand the pupuseria, increase her customers and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: Purchase tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Genesis 4 Group

texts.en:
Phinette is the coordinator of her group, Genesis 4. She makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their 6 children.

Phinette is excited to be taking her 11th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and developed her business. She has had her business for around 5 years, starting with the first loan she received from Esperanza. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing pounds of meat, like beef, pork, and chicken. She will continue using her business profits to save and make her dream of going back to Haiti  come true.  She hopes to have enough money to have a better life there.

Her group is located in El Seybo, an agricultural and rural city. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy meats

loans.name: Erick Tomas Antonio

texts.es:
Erick de 27 años de edad, reside en Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, su familia está conformada por su esposa y tres hijos de 6, 4 y 2 años de edad, él se dedica a la ganadería, negocio que inicio gracias a la ayuda de su padre, no tiene un horario fijo ya que esta actividad demanda de tiempo pero siempre es variante.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para comprar ganado e insumos para realizar la siembra de maíz, esta inversión le permitirá incrementar el negocio y realizar la siembra que también es importante para el sustento del hogar.
Erick espera que el préstamo le ayude a mejorar el comercio y que le estabilice sus ingresos para que su familia cuente con una mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Erick is 27 years old and lives in Santa Elena which is located in the department of Usulután. His family is made up of his wife and three children who are 6, 4 and 2 years old. He raises cattle, a business that he started thanks to the help of his father. He does not have a set schedule since this work is time consuming but always varies. 

He is requesting a loan to buy cattle and to buy supplies to plant corn. This investment will allow him to increase his business and to plant corn which is also an important part of maintaining his home. 

Erick hopes that this loan will help him improve his business and to stabilize his income so that his family can count on better economic conditions.

loans.use: Purchase cattle.

loans.name: Elvis Ruben

texts.es: El señor Elvis se dedica al transporte publico desde hace diez años, con movilidad propia, el señor es casado tiene un hijo que se encuentra en edad escolar, su esposa se dedica al comercio de calzado desde hace tres años, viven en casa de un familiar, este crédito lo están sacando para aumentar la compra de un mini bus y trabajar en las mismas líneas, ya que  el sindicato de su línea le permiten tener dos movilidades, el Sr. Es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable siempre pensando en el bienestar de su familia su deseo es poder ahorrar para comprarse una casita, esta  con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del  crédito.
texts.en: Elvis has been working in public transportation for 10 years. He has his own vehicle. He is married and has a son of school-age. His wife has been selling shoes for three years. They live in a family member's home. They will use this loan to purchase a mini bus to work the same routes he currently works. The union in charge of his routes allows him to have two vehicles. Elvis is very hardworking and responsible and always thinks about the wellbeing of his family. His wish is to be able to save so that he can buy himself a small home. He is thankful to this institution for its support in granting this loan.

loans.use: Purchase a mini bus.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase land.

loans.name: Eusebia Del Carmen

texts.es: Eusebia tiene 55 años, a esta edad ella ha luchado por salir adelante en la vida y ha conocido diferentes experiencias de su negocio. Hace más de 18 años que se dedica a este trabajo como es la venta de granos básicos. Ella siempre ha sido cliente de Fundación León 2000, ella es madre de 1 hijo de que depende de ella, él le ayuda a su Mama en lo que puede. El crédito que realiza es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, maíz, concentrado entre otros. Sueña con proporcionarle ciertas mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Eusebia is 55 years old. At this age she has struggled to get ahead in life and has had different experiences in her business. She has been selling basic grains for more than 18 years. She has always been a customer of field partner Fundación León 2000. She has one son who is dependent on her. He helps his mother with what he can. The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn and concentrates among other things. She dreams with making certain improvements to her home.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El señor Juan G. y su esposa la señora Fermina Isabel Gordillo, tiene un hijo y a quien le quieren dar lo mejor. 
Están solicitando un préstamo para poder pagar el trámite de las escrituras de su vivienda, pero por el momento no cuentan con el dinero necesario para pagar los trámites y les están ofreciendo una oferta un descuento ya quieren aprovechar esta oportunidad. Para asegurar el patrimonio de la familia. 
Planea pagar el crédito con el ingreso que obtiene de su pensión gubernamental, ya que la señora Fermina Isabel se encargara de los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Juan G. lives with his wife Fermina Isabel Gordillo.  They have one child whom they would like to provide with the best in life.  They are requesting this loan so that they can pay for the preparation of legal deeds for their home.  Right now they don't have the money they need to pay for this to be done.  They are being offered a discount and they would like to take advantage of this opportunity in order to guarantee the family's property.

Juan plans to pay the loan back with the income that he obtains from his government pension since his wife Fermina Isabel will take care of their family expenses.

loans.use: To pay for the preparation of the deeds for his home

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: Maria Antonia se dedica a la venta de tortillas. Se encuentra muy entusiasmada por obtener un medio de vida. Ella siempre ha trabajado arduamente para proporcionarle a su familia el alimento diario. El motivo de su financiamiento es para la compra de maíz, comal, bolsas, leña entre otras cosas que son importantes para la elaboración de sus deliciosas tortillas,  atiende todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde que la mayoría de llegan a buscar sus productos. Desea realizarle ciertas mejoras a su hogar.
texts.en: Maria Antonia makes a living selling tortillas. She is very excited about earning a livelihood and has always worked hard to provide for her family's daily sustenance. She is requesting the loan to purchase corn, a hotplate, bags and firewood among other items that are important in making her delicious tortillas. She tends to her business from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m. so a majority can come and see her products. She wishes to make certain improvements to her home.

loans.use: Buy supplies to make tortillas

loans.name: Cristobal

texts.es:
El señor Cristóbal A. Jardín a nacido el 25 de julio de 1974 en la comunidad de Zapata Rancho de la Provincia de Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba.

La vivienda en que vive don Cristóbal es tipo económico donde vive con su familia que tiene tres hijos y actualmente que se dedica a la producción agrícola de tubérculos, como también presta servicio de pasajero en su comunidad.

El crédito que está solicitando es para insumos agrícolas como ser la semilla de papa, zanahoria y abono de gallinaza para ampliar más su producción agrícola y así para tener más ingresos económicos en la actividad económica. Los labores culturales realizan con su familia en algunos casos con ayuda de sus vecinos en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Cristóbal A. Jardín was born on July 25, 1974 in the town of Zapata Rancho, Tiraque Province, in the department of Cochabamba.

The house Cristóbal lives in is a humble place where he lives with his family, including his three children. He currently works growing tubers as well as offering passenger transport in his community.

The loan he is requesting will be used for agricultural supplies such as potato and carrot seeds, and fertilizer to increase his crop yield and his income. His family helps him with the work, as do his neighbors in the community from time to time.

loans.use: Purchase agricultural supplies

loans.name: Ramona De La Concepcion

texts.es: Ramona de la Concepción se dedica a venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 22 años, que tiene este negocio. Por iniciativa propia fue que inicio este medio de vida. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamiento pues ha sido muy productivo. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de calzado, ropa, cosméticos entre otros productos y así decide dedicarse a este negocio. Ella es una persona muy dinámica que siempre está la pendiente de lo que sus clientes le piden y así poder complacerlos y satisfacer la demanda.
texts.en: Ramona de la Concepción operates a business selling general merchandise.  She has owned the business for more than 22 years, a business she started on her own initiative.  This isn't her first loan and past loans have helped her become more productive.  She will use this loan to buy footwear, clothing, and cosmetics, among other products.  Ramona is a very dynamc person who always has an eye out for what her customers might order so that she can be in a position to meet demand.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
El señor Gerardo ha nacido el 23 de Abril de 1968 en la comunidad Kaspicancha Baja en la Provincia de Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba.
La actividad que se dedica el señor Gerardo es la agricultura que produce papa, haba y cereales, las siembras que realiza son temporales en el lugar prácticamente es la parte alta del Municipio.
La vivienda donde vive es muy económico sus características de la vivienda de techo de paja con paredes de barro sus pisos de tierra, vive con su familia  es responsable con sus obligaciones en su casa como también en la comunidad.
El crédito que solicito es para comprar terreno agrícola en el lugar donde vive, según don Gerardo sus terrenos que tienen es muy poco no alcanza como para sembrar suficiente para abastecer su familia, es por esa razón decidió solicitar el préstamo.
texts.en:
Gerardo was born April 23, 1968 in the Kaspicancha Baja community, located in the Tiraque Province in the Department of Cochabamba.

Gerardo’s area of work is agriculture and he grows potatoes, beans, and cereals. He plants seasonally and the place where he grows is practically the high altitude area of the municipality.

The house where he lives is very inexpensive and it has a straw roof, mud walls, and an earthen floor. He lives with his family and he is responsible with his household as well as his community obligations.

The loan that he is requesting is to purchase farmland where he lives. According to Gerardo, he has few lands and they aren’t enough to plant sufficient crops to support his family. This is why he decided to request the loan.

loans.use: To purchase land for farming

loans.name: Clarisa

texts.es: Clarisa, D. 62 años, vive en su casa propia en compañía D. su esposo y sus dos hijos mayores. DesD. hace tres años, Clarisa se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza y al mismo tiempo posee una juguería, ubicada en el primer ambiente D. su casa. Por las mañanas no solo se dedica a vender sus productos D. belleza, sino que también es la ejecutiva y líder D. su zona y es la encargada D. distribuir los productos a cada uno D. sus promotoras. Durante las tardes, a partir D. las seis, atienD. su negocio amablemente, preparando jugos, sándwich D. pollo y D. carne más queques. D. esta manera, está laboriosa mujer distribuye sus tiempos para realizar sus dos actividades que tanto le apasiona,  y le va muy bien, y eso la motiva a seguir trabajando con muchas energías. Para mas adelante Clarisa piensa ampliar su negocio y por ello su preocupación es comprar vitrinas para exhibirlas sus productos o queques. Es su 11avo crédito con MFP, y se compromete pagar todas sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido, y en su banco comunal es una D. las socias mas joviales por lo que todos la estiman. D. obtener el crédito que solicita,  Clarisa realizará más pedidos para la campaña D. san Valentín que se acerca.
texts.en: Clarisa is 62 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her husband and two older children.  For the past three years, Clarisa has worked selling beauty products and also has a juice bar located in the front part of her house.  During the mornings, she not only sells her beauty products, but she is also the executive and area leader and is responsible for distributing the products to each of the sellers.  Starting at 6pm, she happily tends to her business, making juices, chicken and meat sandwiches, and cakes.  This hardworking woman splits her time to complete the two jobs that she is so passionate about, and that are going well for her.  This motivates her to continue working with a lot of energy.  For the future, Clarisa plans to expand her business and as a result, her concern is purchasing display cases to show her products or cakes.  This is her 11th loan with MFP and she promises to make all of her loan payments in the established time frame.  Within her communal bank, she is one of the most cheerful members, which is why everyone values her.  In obtaining the loan requested, Clarisa will fill more orders for the approaching Valentine’s Day season.

loans.use: To stock up with beauty products

loans.name: Igor

texts.en:
Igor Z. and his wife live in Kahovka, in the Kherson region. Their children are grown and live separately. Igor runs a small mobile business selling construction and remodeling supplies in several marketplaces in neighboring small towns. He has been working in this niche of trade for 15 years. Currently, he has 87,000 Grivnas in working capital.

Igor is focused and determined. His experience working in the construction and remodeling spheres helps him to be very organized and efficient in his business. Igor is hoping to see the number of construction sites in the Ukraine increase, which would subsequently stimulate development of his venture. He is seeking a loan of 10,000 Grivnas to purchase additional construction supplies for retail sale.

loans.use: To purchase additional construction supplies

loans.name: Pasos Firme 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Ruth is one of the members of Pasos Firme 1 2 & 3 (Firm Steps) groups. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their 3 children.

Ruth is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for around 3 years, starting with a capital her partner in love gave her to make a  business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing underwear for men and women. She will use the profits to invest in her business and to add more products to his business.

Ruth's story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally, her group is located in the rural area surrounding El Seibo, an agricultural area,.  This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

Notes: The two women in the small photo at the bottom are part of the group, they are completing the fifteen members. At the moment of the group photo, they were organizing the repayments schedule.

loans.use: to buy underwear

loans.name: Juana De La Concepcion

texts.es: La señora Juana tiene 67 años. Es madre soltera y vive junto a su 1 hijo que ha luchado para salir adelante. La actividad económica a la que se dedica es una pulpería. Hace más de 5 años que labora con esta actividad, por lo que es importante para ella. Ya que le gusta mucho su trabajo porque conoce a muchas personas, hace buenas relaciones y eso la ayuda a incrementar su lista de clientes, de esa manera sigue incrementando sus ventas. El financiamiento que solicita es parar capital de trabajo para la compra de golosinas en general, refrescos, gaseosas, detergentes entre otras cosas. En un futuro le gustaría tener su propia distribuidora para abastecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: Juana is 67 years old.  She is a single mother and lives alone with her son who has fought to get ahead.  Juana’s business is a grocery store that she has worked at for more than five years, which is why it is important to her.  She likes her work a lot because she meets a lot of people and forms good relationships.  This helps her to increase her list of customers and as a result, her sales continue increasing.  The loan that she is requesting is for working capital to purchase general sweets, drinks, sodas, and detergents, among other things.  In the future, she would like to have her own wholesale business to supply her customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es: La Sra. Magdalena tiene como actividad la de peinadora, tiene su salón de belleza donde realiza todo tipo de cortes de cabello y tratamientos de belleza, de esta manera ya trabaja 12 años continuos manteniendo su hogar con esta actividad, la Sra. es una persona muy trabajadora y de muy buen carácter, su hogar esta conformado por ella y sus dos hijos, esta oportunidad solicita crédito para la compra de insumos de peluquería por mayor ( tintes, líquidos Champo, cremas, etc.) y para pagar la matriculación y pensiones del primer semestre de la universidad de su hijo mayor, ya que pronto empezara sus clases, es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Señora Magdalena is a stylist and she has a beauty salon where she does all types of haircuts and beauty treatments.  She has been doing this for 12 years and it has supported her household.  She is a very hard-working and good-natured person.  Her household is made up of her and her two children.  She is requesting a loan to purchase wholesale hairdressing supplies (dyes, shampoo, cream, etc) and also, to pay the registration and room and board fees for her son's first semester at the university as he will be starting his classes soon.  She is a very hard-working, responsible person and she is grateful to the institution for their support.

loans.use: To purchase wholesale products for her beauty salon and also, to pay her son's university fees

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es: Maximiliana, es una mujer responsable y trabajadora de 22 años; que junto a su esposo Miguel cuidan de su adorable hijo Swin, de 2 años. En armonía, ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Yanama Alto. Hace tan solo 3 años, comenzó a incursionar en la agricultura, donde siembra arveja, papa y olluco; los que después de la cosecha los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Paralelamente a su negocio ella se dedica a la ganadería, donde tiene animales entre, carneros, vacas y toros. Por su juventud y el futuro de su familia, ella desea incursionar en el negocio de compra y venta de granos verdes, pues es un negocio rentable, ya que existe muy pocos acopiadores. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama”, y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde trabaja con empeño y dedicación. Después de su cosecha de arveja, Maximiliana, necesitará capital para la siembra de sus 3 hectáreas de terreno agrícola, por ello con el aporte que recibirá, comprará semillas de zanahoria los cuales sembrará en estos días.
texts.en:
Maximiliana is a responsible and hard-working 22 year old. Along with her husband, Miguel, she takes care of her adorable son, Swin, who is two years old. They live in harmony in their own house, located in the farm of Yanama Alto. Three years ago, she began to venture into agriculture, where she plants peas, potatoes, and olluco [a root plant]. After harvesting them, she sells them in a large market in the city of Tarma. At the same time as she runs her business, she ranches. She has animals including rams, cows, and bulls. Because of her young age and for the future of her family, she wants to venture into the business of buying and selling fresh grains. This is because it is a profitable business that has very few workers. She belongs to the communal bank "Manatiales de Yanama", and this is the sixth loan with MFP, where she works with strength and dedication. After harvesting the peas, Maximiliana will need money to plant her three hectares of agricultural land. With the support that she will receive, she will buy carrot seeds which she will plant during that time.



Maximiliana, es una mujer responsable y trabajadora de 22 años; que junto a su esposo Miguel cuidan de su adorable hijo Swin, de 2 años. En armonía, ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Yanama Alto. Hace tan solo 3 años, comenzó a incursionar en la agricultura, donde siembra arveja, papa y olluco; los que después de la cosecha los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Paralelamente a su negocio ella se dedica a la ganadería, donde tiene animales entre, carneros, vacas y toros. Por su juventud y el futuro de su familia, ella desea incursionar en el negocio de compra y venta de granos verdes, pues es un negocio rentable, ya que existe muy pocos acopiadores. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama”, y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde trabaja con empeño y dedicación. Después de su cosecha de arveja, Maximiliana, necesitará capital para la siembra de sus 3 hectáreas de terreno agrícola, por ello con el aporte que recibirá, comprará semillas de zanahoria los cuales sembrará en estos días.

loans.use: To buy carrot seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fabric and other items.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Ana Isabel tiene 27 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 6, 4 y 2 años de edad, viven junto a su madre y una hermana, ellos residen en Ereguayquin Usulután, Ana administra un comedor, este negocio comenzó hace un año, trabajando con dos empleadas, no tienen un horario fijo de atención.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mobiliario y mercadería para el comedor, esta inversión le ayudara a atender mejor a los clientes, de una forma más cómoda y que tenga mejor vistosidad el negocio.
Su visión es desarrollarse en el mercado de alimentos, tener mucha clientela y que su local cuente con las mejores instalaciones para transmitir a los clientes buena imagen, garantizando estabilidad a su familia.
texts.en: Ana Isabel is 27 years old and a single mother to 3 children, ages 6,4 and 2.  They live with her mother and sister in Ereguayquin Usulután.  Ana has been running a cafeteria for a year with the help of two employees.  She doesn't have a fixed schedule.  Currently, she is requesting a loan to purchase furniture and merchandise for the cafeteria.  This will help her to better serve her customers, making her business more comfortable and lively.  Her goals are to develop her business into a food market, to have a large customer base and to have the best local to convey a good image to her customers, ensuring stability for her family.

loans.use: To purchase furniture for her cafeteria

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix, es un hombre valiente y trabajador, de 36 años; que junto a su esposa Dina, cuidan de sus 3 menores hijos; Fresia, Frank, y Denis. Los que en armonía familiar viven en su casa propia, ubicada  en el caserío de Yanama Alto. Hace 15 años esté sorprendente hombre comenzó su camino de desarrollo económico por la agricultura; donde siembra diversos productos oriundos como papa, arveja y flor de gladiolo. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder invertir, pues su secreto es; la siembra escalonada, que consiste en sembrar diversos productos, para poder contrarrestar las variaciones de  los precios en el mercado. Ahora después de su próxima cosecha, comenzará a sembrar habas, adelantándose a la temporada, de esa manera estabilizará su economía. Los planes de Félix, son adquirir un auto con el que pueda dedicarse al transporte público en sus días libres. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Yanama”, y esté es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde es un socio activo y comprometido con el trabajo que desempeñan los integrantes de su banco. Félix, cosechará flor de gladiolo dentro de unos días, por ello está pensando invertir el aporte que recibirá en la compra de abono orgánico, asimismo en el salario de los peones para que le ayuden en su cosecha.
texts.en:
Félix is a courageous and hard-working man of 36 who, together with his wife Dina, cares for his three dependent children: Fresia, Frank and Denis.  He and his family live together harmoniously in their own home which is located in the village of Yanama Alto.

15 years ago, this surprising man set out on his path to economic development in the field of agriculture.  He grows a variety of native products such as potatoes, peas and gladioli.  What he most likes about his work is being able to invest.  His secret is staggered planting.  This consists of sowing different products so that he can counteract the ups and downs of market prices.  Following his next harvest, he will begin to sow beans, getting a jump start on the season.  In this way, he will stabilize his finances.

Félix's plans are to buy a car which he will be able to use to provide a public transport service on his days off.  He is a member of the "Manantiales de Yanama" (Yanama Springs) community bank and this is his fifth loan with MFP.  He is an active member of his community bank and is committed to the work that the members of the bank carry out.  Félix will harvest his gladioli in a few days' time.  For this reason, he is thinking of investing his loan money in buying organic manure and paying the salary of the laborers who will help him with his harvest.

loans.use: To buy organic manure and to pay the salary of the laborers who will help him with his harvest

loans.name: Ana Liseth

texts.es:
Ana, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, donde vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 6 y 2 años de edad, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, negocio que inicio con la ayuda de su madre, no tiene horario fijo, por el momento quiere comprar más cerdos pero no cuenta con los recursos, por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar dicha inversión.
La obtención de este préstamo le ayudara a ampliar la granja, a tener más animalitos para comercializar y sacar de ellos un buen provecho, fortaleciendo sus ingresos familiares y mejorando su situación económica.
El Objetivo de Ana es mejorar en el comercio de Cerdos, tener un espacio grande para la granja, y velar por el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana, who lives in San Rafael Oriento, in the San Miguel department, lives with her husband and two children who are 6 and 2 years old. She raises pigs, which is a business that she started with the help of the mother. She doesn't have a set schedule. She wants to buy more pigs, but does not have the resources. This is why she is asking for a loan to reach her goal.
This loan will help her to make the farm bigger, to have more animals to sell, and to make a good profit off of them. This will strengthen the family income and improve their economic situation.
Ana's objective is to improve her pig business, to have a big space for the farm, and to look after the well-being of her children.

loans.use: Purchase pigs

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. José es nacido en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la sierra el 21 de mayo el Sr. José se dedica al  Transporte y Venta de Material De Construcción tiene como responsabilidad llevar adelante su hogar ya que es el único que mantiene a su familia, su conyugue es la señora Ivana se dedica a labores de casa y al cuidado de su hijo de 1 año y 3 meses su nombres, el señor José Antonio lleva trabajando en este rubro de lo que es la venta de material de construcción hace  4 años. Solicito el crédito en Emprender lo cual se la esta brindando tiene como destino comprarse un juego de llantas para su camión ya que con este transporta el material de construcción vende ya que entrega en la obra, es una persona joven y trabajadora que esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mr. José was born in the city of Santa Cruz in the mountain range on May 21st. José transports and sells construction materials. He maintains his family since it is his responsibility.  His wife, Mrs. Ivana, is a housewife and takes care of their one year and three month old son. José Antonio has been selling construction material for 4 years. He requested the loan from Emprender who offered it. He has planned to buy a set of wheels for his truck since he uses it to transport the materials he sells. He is a young and hardworking person who is thankful for the institution's help.

loans.use: To buy a set of wheels.

loans.name: Helen Brigida

texts.es:
La señora Helen Brigida M. tiene 37 años de edad y vive en una casa de propiedad de la junta vecinal del barrio donde vive, vivienda que está ubicada en un barrio de la  ciudad de Tarija. Helen es madre soltera de 1 hijo, por circunstancias de la vida se quedó sola ahora ella tiene que trabajar para poder sacar adelante a su hijo. Helen se dedica desde hace más de 11 años a la elaboración de refrescos, jugos, licuados. Mismos que los comercializa en el mercado La Paz, teniendo muy buena clientela que prefieren comprar sus productos por ser de muy buena calidad y tener buen gusto. Helen quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante con su hijo , pero ella nos cuenta que quiere cambiar su frizeer que tiene por uno nuevo, también comprar mercadería porque ahora que se acerca el fin de año las ventas aumentan. Es por eso que el crédito será destinado para la compra del frizeer y mercadería necesaria para realizar su actividad para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Helen nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite será para la compra de otro horno que mucha falta le hace.
texts.en:
Mrs. Helen Brigida M. is 37 years old and lives in her own house in Tarija. Helen is a single mother of one son. Because of life circumstances, she is alone and has to work so that she can move forward with her son. Helen has been making drinks, juices, and shakes for more than eleven years. She sells them in the La Paz (Peace) market. She has a good clientele that prefers to buy her products because they are of very good quality and have good taste. Helen wants to have a better income to get ahead in life for her son. She says that she wants to exchange her freezer for a new one. She also wants to buy merchandise, because close to the end of the year, sales go up. It is for this reason that the loan will be used for the purchase of the freezer and necessary merchandise to ensure that her business can increase her income.
Helen says that she wants to improve her life conditions. That is why she says that the next loan that she asks for will be for the purchase of another oven that she really needs.

loans.use: To buy a freezer

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos, reside en Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, donde vive con sus padres y hermanos, él es soltero tiene 27 años de edad, se dedica a la ganadería y crianza de cerdos desde hace 5 años, su padre le enseño a trabajar con la ganadería. Carlos no tiene un horario fijo para atender al ganado y a los cerdos.
Él necesita un préstamo para comprar cerdos, con esta inversión ampliara la granja, también estará creciendo en el comercio mejorando sus ingresos para dar mantenimiento a la granja y cubrir los gastos que demanda una granja.
Sueña con tener casa propia, este sueño lo motiva cada día para seguir trabajando y poder lograrlo.
texts.en:
Carlos lives in Santa Elena, in Usulután department, with his parents and siblings.  He is 27 years old, single, and works as a livestock farmer.  He has been raising pigs for 5 years, having been taught this business by his father.  Carlos doesn't work regular hours looking after his pigs.
